"ugh... Stupid shavings why do you even get left behind" Brianna said as she took a deep breath and blow all the shavings off her desk without a second thought as to any small creatures that could be trying to use them. She swept the bigger ones that didn't blow away off the desk with her hand and returned to her math test
"Ughnnn... I'm so gonna fail" Brianna said as she put her hand on her face as she noticed one last piece of rubber from the eraser and grabbed it between two fingers
"Going for distance" she said as she lined up her shot with on of her class mates and flicked it at her friend megan with all she could, hitting her right in the belly button (shes wearing a crop top). Megan looked around and saw Brianna giggling and discreetly flipped her the bird with mouthing "bitch" and smiling and went back to her test

Where did you end up in all this?

1. blown off into the crazy world

2. Swept to the floor under Brianna

3. Launched at Megan (stayed on)

4. Launched at Megan (flung off mod flight)
1133122122.title: Clearing clutter

choices: Brianna steps on the earser and you, and get stuck inbetween her shoe treads
The class is let out, and a janitor comes to sweep the floor
11331221221.content:
You thought you were saved. You thought everything was going to be okay, and you would get rescued and life would return to normal. You were wrong. This was only the beginning of the worst tortue you've even endured. Brianna's massive face took over your world, but her eyes were not on your miniscule body. In fact, she didn't even see your puny form there. She had absolutely no idea a human being was alongside the insignificant eraser shavings she had deemed worthless trash. She pursed her lips, and you suddenly realized what was happening. As quickly as you could. you grabbed onto a large chuck of eraser that was left behind. Gale force winds assaulted you as you held as tight as you could. It was insane to think that such force was coming from a teenage girl. You knew that if you let go, it would be all over for you, but it was getting harder and harder as her breath never let up. You also noticed a slightly tangy scent hitting your nostrils. It nearly made you gag but you had to stay concentrated.

Eventually the wind stopped and you were safe...except you weren't. Brianna's massive face lifted to the heavens and was replaced instead by a smaller-yet still massive-hand. You screamed as loud as you could as the massive wall of flesh bulldozed into the eraser shaving you were still gripping with your life. It rolled and tumbled along the table until the table vanished from beneath it. You felt yourself freefalling to the ground, expecting to die. You were not lucky enough to die. The eraser landed with a slight bounce, saving your life, but soon rolled over and trapped you. You were stuck, face down on the floor with the eraser on top of you, pinning you down unable to move at all. You were trapped on the floor.
11331221221.title: Fell to the floor

choices: Miss Brand drank you
You remain in the mug
11331222.content:
Miss Clara Brand slowly swirled the coffee in her mug. She absolutely hated testing days, though not for the same reasons as Brianna. They killed the energy in the class that she had worked so hard to cultivate. Clara had become a teacher to help kids enjoy learning, but all she was doing was administering standardized tests. She had tried to change it up, of course, but the principal shot all of her ideas down with words of "state mandates" and "No Child Left Behind."

The coffee was cold, and had been for a good half an hour. If this was an English class, she would have probably made a comment on how it reflects the chilly mood in the room. Instead, she took a sip, swirling the drink around her mouth. Periods like these were always so boring. Clara could be grading some of the kids homework, but that looked to be as unappealing as the old coffee.

She contemplated pouring the drink out, but in the end just downed the cup. She stared at the dredges left at the bottom for a moment, then set the cup down. Quietly sighing, she pulled out a red pen and began to mark up the papers scattered about her desk.
11331222.title: Cold Coffee

choices: You strike a nerve, causing Miss Brand some discomfort
Miss Brand feels nothing and continues her day
113312221.content:
The dank, humid cave of this woman's mouth greets you as she greedily sucks down the frigid coffee and you without a second thought. Your screams are unheard as you're flushed violently into the teacher's maw, and it's only by complete chance that you manage to get washed onto the surface of one of her coffee-stained molars deep in the back instead of flushed down her throat into the abyss. You whimper as her lips seal close and everything goes dark.

Suddenly, massive pressure crushes you and you yelp in fear, expecting to be ground to pulp between the massive teeth. But instead you're forced harshly into what feels like a small opening. The pressure is tight and the top tooth sits grimly on top of you, saliva leaking in all around and already coating you. You have no way of knowing, but your tiny body is currently trapped in a large cavity of this teacher's chipped molar.

The "ceiling" lifts for a moment, and light floods into your prison enough to give you a view of the glistening flesh all around, and then everything rumbles as the woman sighs. It feels like a tropical storm is going off around you. Then, darkness.

You start squirming, trying to unwedge yourself, but the top molar clamps down again pushing you even deeper. Spitting out flecks of saliva, you try thrashing at anything around you to get a foothold before you become a permanent resident of this teacher's mouth...
113312221.title: Nothing But The Tooth

choices: You were spit into the sink
You are still in the mouth
1133122211.content:
"Ow!"

The teacher's cry went far in the empty class. The students, happy for a distraction, all looked towards her. "Are you alright, Miss Brand?" asked one of the brown-nosers.

Miss Brand rubbed the side of her jaw. "Yes, dear, I think I'll- ow!" There it was again; a sharp pain in her back molar, the one she'd chipped a few weeks back. She'd resisted going to the dentist, but if it was going to bother her like this...

"Go back to your tests, kids. I'm going to - ow - be fine." She dug her tongue back there, but she couldn't place anything out of the ordinary. The pain, though, remained constant, a dull throb that occasionally pulsed painfully hot. She looked down at her cup; had her coffee gone bad?

She dialed a number on her desk phone. "Hello, office? This is Miss Brand. I need someone to take over for me for a couple minutes." She paused; she wasn't going to worry the admin about her tooth problem just yet. "I just need to use the restroom. Alright, thank you."

She played with the spot with her tongue while she waited for her sub, and for the whole trip to the teacher bathroom. Opening her mouth wide, she stared at her bad molar in the mirror. Again, nothing seemed wrong or out of place. She was about to dismiss it, but another sharp wave of pain hit.

Cupping her hands, she gathered some water from the sink and filled her mouth. The cool water felt soothing. She swished it around, back and forth, front of the mouth and back of the mouth. If this didn't make the pain go away, she'd need to schedule a dentists appointment, or at least do something about the pain. She spit the water out back into the sink's basin, and waited to see if it hurt.

At least the school had great dental insurance.
1133122211.title: You can't handle the tooth

choices: Miss Brand is visiting the dentist
Miss Brand is jamming a toothpick in to get at you...!
11331222112.content:
You were in hell. The woman's tongue, massive and writhing, invaded your slimy hovel within the molar, pressing against you and forcing you even deeper into the cavity. Though you had no way of knowing, your squirming was pressing against a nerve in the tooth, causing your unaware captor to painfully vocalize her discomfort so loudly to your ears you nearly went deaf. As she spoke, your prison heaved up and down, all while saliva poured all around you and threatened to drown you for good.

The tongue invaded again, sloshing around and threatening to scoop you up and into the unknown. You felt the swaying movement of the woman's body below.

Soon light flooded into your world and you blinked as you could once again see the world beyond the walls of teeth. Before you, at IMAX proportions was the teacher's mouth. You were confused at first until you realized she was looking into a mirror. That meant she could feel you down here! You started screaming for help, sputtering in the pool of saliva you were suspended in. No dice though, she heard nothing and looking at the reflection of her mouth miles away, you could barely even make yourself out in the molar. You were pressed deep. Fear began to wash over you as you realized this lady's mouth could potentially be your grave.

Suddenly everything lurched and you saw but a glimpse of her hands rushing towards the maw, carrying a tidal wave of freezing water. You screamed as the tsunami roared around you, nearly ripping you from the tooth and potentially in half. Soon everything drained away and there was silence again. You tried to pry your arm out of the wedge of bone you found yourself trapped in, but you slipped backwards and your foot jammed deeper into the carved-out hole of the tooth, kicking harshly into something fleshy. Not even a second after this happened, you heard the loudest sound yet erupt from the throat behind you, jarring your mind with such force that you blacked out.

When you finally woke up again...
11331222112.title: Struck A Nerve

choices: The dentist spots the man in the mirror
The man is blown free by the blast of an air compressor
In comes a sharp tool...
113312221121.content:
"Okay, say 'aah'."

Miss Brand obeyed the dentist's instruction neatly, straining her jaw to allow space for hands and tools to fit within. The pain in her tooth had stopped after that last time, almost an hour ago, when the worst of it had had her almost screaming her lungs out. Some might have assumed that the problem had solved itself, but the diligent teacher has chosen to take the opportunity to have a professional take a look-see.

And Lucille Hatfield was every inch the professional. With wireframe glasses and a severe ponytail, face devoid of make-up, she gave the impression of no life outside of the dentistry: no time for any outside interests. As usual, she wasted no time with small talk before getting down to business.

With light and mirror she counted through the teeth as she had hundreds of times before, her gloved hands itching with the anticipation of having to perform a procedure, and really inflict some pain.
113312221121.title: An Apple A Day Could Have Prevented This

choices: Lucille shows you to Miss Brand, salvation!
Lucille places you in a paper cup, uh oh.
1133122211213.content:
Bright light floods the mouth that holds you captive,so much so that its blinding, even from your trapped position. As your eyes adjust, you notice another face peering into the open maw. You watch the face move to the side and scream at what you see take its place.

A hand. More specifically, A hand holding a dentists pick headed right for you. You scream as it heads to the bottom of the teeth you're stuck between and begins pull upwards. The horrific scraping sound is 100x worse than just sitting at the dentist. It racks your brain.

With only a moment to think, you begin to try and push your body in the direction the pick is headed, hoping to use its force to help you become free. With a stroke of luck, the pick stops right below you, stuck. You can feel it touching your feet and in a last gasp effort, you use it as leverage to push off, freeing your body.

Your victory is cut short as you being to fall. Not wanting to end up in the back of this woman's throat, you reach for any purchase and wrap your arms around the smooth metallic pick, which is thicker than a telephone pole to you. With your last bit of energy, you pull your legs up and brace yourself as the pick begins to move once more.

You moan as the pick flies through the air and stops in front of a glassy surface. Turning you see a massive eye, magnified even more through the distorting lens. The pupil dilates as it focuses on you.

"FASCINATING."

You're saved! Or are you?
1133122211213.title: In comes a sharp tool...

choices: Ms. Brand washes the mug out
Ms. Brand knocks the mug off her desk by accident
113312222.content:
When the teacher lifted the mug up to drink the remaining coffee you were suspended in, you nearly had a heart attack. First your prison was spun around slowly, disorienting you and almost causing you to drown in the cold bitter drink, but then everything lurched upward.

"Please! Down here!! I've shrunk! Help!!" you shouted upward at the teacher's titanic face, but her expression remained disinterested. You panicked as everything began to tilt forward towards her mouth. "No!! Don't--!!" is all you managed to get out before the brown waves overtook you and swept you forward.

Thankfully, the uncaring goddess was only taking a sip of the coffee, and the wave you were currently riding was not part of that, instead crashing into the wall of her upper lip jarring you considerably. You sank beneath the surface seeing stars as the coffee mug hovered in her hand.

Sputtering and gagging, you broke the surface of the cold beverage. You wanted to continue your shouting routine, but you were too busy wheezing and trying to get coffee out of your lungs. Suddenly everything began to sway again and your eyes widened as the teacher's mouth came back to mug's edge for revenge--!!

"No!! Please just see me!!! Help!!! Don't drink me!!!!!" you shrieked as you were once again pulled towards the looming humid tunnel of her opened maw. Fear wracked your soul as you considered what would happen if you entered her digestive system, and it was that fear that led to you snapping into reality and swimming for your life.

Perhaps it was the looming threat of certain death, or the innate desire to survive, but you pushed past your limits, breast-stroking against the crashing rapids of coffee violently sweeping into the teacher's mouth.

But soon even that strength gave out and you felt yourself sliding along with the last thin amounts of coffee. You were just about to scream when the teacher lifted her lips from the mug's edge with a thick smack. Still suspended in the last drops of coffee, you gasped as you looked up at the woman's planet-sized face staring remorselessly down on your pitiful form. Had she seen you? You started to lift up an arm when--

THUCK!

The mug was set back onto the desk, slamming you onto the bottom. You choked and sputtered up the bitter liquid. This last experience just about broke you. You were almost drank, consumed by another human being and she wouldn't have even noticed. You curled up tight into a ball and began sobbing heavily as the teacher above let out a sigh. You could hear the sounds of her pen scribbling on paper outside your prison, the rest of the world continuing on without you.
113312222.title: The Dangers of Drinking

choices: ...been washed into the sink
...clung desperately to her hands
1133122221.content:
Even at a crawl, time still moves forward. First period came to an end, then second and third. Finally, the fourth period bell rang, signaling lunch time. Ms. Brand smiled as the kids poured forth from the classroom. They weren't the only ones who enjoyed a good break. Grabbing her empty mug, she locked the room and headed for the teacher's lounge.

The lounge was near empty, as usual. Most of the teachers here preferred to eat in their own classes, in case one of the students needed extra help with something, but Ms. Brand rather spend her half an hour away from the screaming masses. After popping a tv dinner into the microwave, she brought her mug over to the sink. She turned the faucet to as hot as it would go and began to rinse the dried coffee out from it.

The microwave beeped at her. Letting the mug fill with water, she pulled the meal out and gave it a stir. Another minute, and it'd be ready.

The mug had overflown with water by this point, flooding into the sink basin. She shut the water off and emptied the mug,before wiping it down with a cloth and setting it by the sink to dry. She returned to the meal, pulling it free from the microwave and setting it on the table. Her hands were still damp, and to her chagrin they dribbled a bit of water into the food. The school's piping wasn't all the great and she'd rather not have it in her food, but she wasn't going to toss her meal away for a couple of drops. Sighing, she wiped her hands dry on the tablecloth and began to eat.

Before she knew it, lunch was over. Tossing the plastic tray away, she headed out, back to her classroom, ready to teach the next period, completely unaware that while she washed her mug, a very small man had...
1133122221.title: Doing the dishes

choices: Ms. Brand has acid reflux
more food begins piling in
11331222212.content:
Curled tightly in a ball, you sobbed openly to yourself in pitch darkness while horrible sloppy groaning sounds gurgled around you. The mashed up bolus that encased you pressed up against your raw, burnt skin and stung. If you focused, you could hear the everyday sounds of a class in progress, an eerie contrast to the feeling of tepid sludge churning around you. You were eaten, whole and alive by a teacher who never even knew of your presence. If she were aware of a live human dwelling within her gullet, you were sure your captor would do everything in her power to free you. But you were smaller than even the flecks of processed seasonings within her meal and had no hope of ever alerting her to your fate. All you could do now is lie here and await digestion, and dwell on the moments that led you here...

The teacher carried the mug you were trapped in to the teacher's lounge, ignorant to your desperate pleas for help the entire way. Soon the faucet of a sink loomed ominously above you and you found yourself confronted with a deluge of scalding hot water. Everything at this point was a blur; you could remember gagging and sputtering as the rapids pulled you under, nearly boiling you alive. Then the water stopped and you were washed from the edge of the mug onto the teacher's titanic hand like beach trash.You barely had a moment to recover however before gravity and the leftover moisture surrounding you carried you downward, off the woman's bare skin and into the steaming vat of her TV dinner's brownie.

From there, well was nothing but pure pain. As you screamed in agony at the heat of the food you were suspend in the woman ate leisurely above, saving your for last, cruelly extending your torture. You were fading in and out of consciousness at this point, but you'll never forget her fork carrying you high into the air towards her giant maw. The smell of her breath, the sickening churning of being inside her mouth while she chewed. And the harsh pressure when she swallowed you into the depths of her body.

Now deep within the pit of her stomach, you had no idea how much longer you had to live. it was difficult to even tell how much time had passed. All you had to keep your company was the swaying and lurching of her body as she moved and the muffled sounds of the outside world, unfairly continuing on without you. A tidal wave of slop pushed over you, muffling your shrieks of terror, and everything began to rumble and churn...
11331222212.title: Devoured

choices: You were flung back onto her hand
You were flung back into her mouth
113312222121.content:
Ms. Brand felt her stomach begin grumble mid way through a lesson on graphing. She had some Tums in her desk, but the kids were listening and she wasn't going to risk losing that.

Her stomach continued to complain throughout the period, and so during passing she downed one of those chalky tablets. Immediately she felt better. Only one period left for me today anyway, she thought to herself. No more microwave dinners though.

As the next class began to pile in, however, she felt a rumble once more. She tried to hold it in, but to her disgust she belched. "Oh, I'm sorry-" she began, before feeling another growing inside her. Quickly she threw her hand in front of her mouth and burped, loud and long.

"Alright alright, it's very funny to burp," she said to her class, trying to calm them down before beginning the day's lesson, unaware of the consequences of her gas.
113312222121.title: Refluxive

choices: Ms. Brand picks you out
You end up stuck between her teeth
1133122221212.content:
You weren't sure whether or not to be happy you were still alive. One moment you were being buried alive in the contents of this woman's stomach. When the immense weight of the Tums tablet fell onto you and pushed you deep into the sloshy remains of the teacher's lunch you were sure it was the end. Next thing you know you're flung harshly through the air, riding a wave of superheated gas and cacophonous thunder. Your eyes sting from the newfound light, but through blurred vision you manage to make out the sights of a classroom bordered by the rows of the teacher's teeth. Somehow, you were belched up into her mouth.

Unfortunately it was difficult to appreciate that when your entire world was pain. Your body stung everywhere from the stomach's acids, in every orifice. Laying on this woman's massive tongue, you try to scream out to alert her to your presence but instead you vomit up what feels like gallons of acid-- both yours and her's. Your entire body inside and out feels like it's on fire. To add even more to your torture the woman's mouth opens yet again to speak to the class and from your perspective everything goes crazy. Her mouth's movements alone send you flying, but her voice! At this range her voice is booming at a volume no human can comprehend. You half-expect to be catapulted from her mouth entirely but instead you ricochet off one of the front teeth on her bottom row. Your head spinning, you barely manage to figure out what's going on before the bottom of her tongue buries you in warm, moist flesh. Saliva bubbles up around you and you feel warm blood trickle from your shredded eardrums as Ms. Brand continues her lecture. Feeling the strength rapidly leave your body as her heavy tongue presses down on you, you just close your eyes and begin crying once more, waiting for the end to come.
1133122221212.title: Mouthing Off

choices: Spitting you into the sink
Crushing you between her teeth
11331222212122.content:
She didn't notice it until she was driving home, but once she did, it was all she could think about. Mrs. Brand wrinkled her face, lips contorting as she stared at the back if her mouth in her bathroom mirror. The whole drive home she had spend jamming her tongue into the annoyance. She stuck her finger in her mouth, clawing at the little pale speck with her nail. It was probably a piece of the frozen lunch she'd had earlier in the day, but that hardly mattered if she couldn't get it free.

She tried her tongue once more. The tip of the muscle rubbed up and down over the exposed bits of the annoyance, slowly at first, as if she were trying to gently coax it out. When it stubbornly remained between the two molars, she upped the force, pushing into it in the hopes of knocking it free. All that resulted in was a spray of spit on the (formerly) clean mirror.

Sighing, she popped open the mirror and pulled out a strand of dental floss. She could stand to floss mote, anyhow. One by one, she flossed between each of her teeth until the only untouched gap was the one holding the annoyance. Jamming the minty thread, she jimmied it along, tugging until...

Pop! The annoyance slipped free, landing on her tongue. Finally, she thought to herself, before:
11331222212122.title: Don't forget to floss

113312222121222.content:
You scream, though you can't hear it. The decimals of this teacher's voice have long since you rendered you deaf. That doesn't stop you from feeling the shredding pain of her floss dragging across your body, stinging and ripping at your skin already raw from braving her digestive tract. You cry and wail, begging her to realize you're human, and for a brief moment you think she might actually have when you feel yourself yanked from between the crevice of your teeth. You land on her tongue, gurgling in pain and waiting for the cavern of her mouth to open.

It never does. Her tongue dips, spilling you onto the surface of a molar. You can't quite see what's happening in the darkness, but the sloshing saliva makes you worried her lips aren't going to part after all. All you want is to see her mouth open and her fingers reach in to pull you from this hell but instead all you get is the feeling of her top molar coming down onto your tiny form with unbelievable speed. You're barely able to get a yelp out before your body is completely pulverized into the crushing vice of her teeth. A brief flash of hot, blinding pain is all you feel before your consciousness instantly snaps away and then... there's nothing....
113312222121222.title: Molar Mash

choices: Follow Kira's advice and seduce Ted
Follow her heart and romance Ted
113313.content:
"Can you pass me the sodium hydroxide? The aqueous solution, I mean."

"Ye-Yeah, here it is." Brianna fumbled for the flask, trying to hide her nervousness. Of course she'd been paired with Teddy Richards. Of course she'd been forced to do this lab with not just a Junior, but the hottest, smartest, sexiest...

"Brianna?"

She broke out in an incredible blush. "I-I-I'm sorry. I, uh, I, I mean..."

He gave her a smile, melting her young heart. "I was just asking if you got that measurement. We both need these written down you know."

And he was looking out for her? It was all just too much. She was making such a fool out of herself. "Uh, yeah. It was a half molar solution, right?"

"Yup. Okay, now watch." Slowly, he poured in a pre-made solution of hydrochloric acid into the flask. The reaction was... subtle, at best. Brianna looked away, right at Ted's perfect face. He was much more interesting to watch.



Thunk. Brianna slammed her head into her locker during passing period. "I can't work with him, Kira. I just can't. He's too goddamn pretty!"

Kira, leaning back against her adjacent locker, simply laughed. "It's not hard to get guys, Bree."

"Of course you say that, miss perfect. 'Oh, I'm Kira and I'm only a sophomore but I'm already taking two AP classes and the captain of cheer.'" There was hostility in Brianna's voice, but it wasn't aimed at her friend.

Kira rested her hand on Brianna's shoulder. "You know what? I think I can help solve your little boy problem. Are you free after classes today?"

"No. Soccer game against George Washington High. You know they're good."

"And after that?"

"Parents are going out. I've got to babysit my kid sister."

"Well then we'll start now. First off, this outfit. Blouse-skirt-flats is fine casual wear, but boys want more. They're driven by sex, after all. And you, my precious Bree, are a soccer star with a body that shows it. Shorter skirt, skimpier top, and you'll have boys like a horse has flies."

"Anything more... immediate? I've got to see Ted again once more during band."

"Hmmm... The shoes. Heels make your legs seem longer, and dudes love long legs." Kira opened her locker, digging around for a bit before pulling out a pair of heeled sandals. "Ideally you'd get your own pair and match it with your own style, but this can work for now."

"I don't know. Doesn't this seem kind of superficial? Shouldn't I try to get him to like me for my personality?"

"Get him to like you for your looks, then keep him with your personality. Trust me." She held out the heeled sandals again.

Brianna gave them a look, before deciding to...
113313.title: Young love

choices: Jump ship
Stay here
1133131.content:
It wasn't exactly what you were expecting as an opportunity, but by God were you willing to take it. The girl's toes had clenched slightly as she took her foot out of the flat, bringing you for the ride, but now that she was strapping the sandal up, your were free to metaphorically move about the cabin.

You hesitated for just a second, curious to why she was switching shoes in the middle of the day. The conversation up above was a bit hard to follow, but it seemed it was about a boy? Maybe? It didn't really matter, not that you were free from her shoe.

But, were you really free? You were still a speck in a world of skyscrapers. Lets say you pried yourself off of the clammy skin and jumped to the ground. What then? You'd be trampled, or worse. If you waited, stuck around between her toes like a little ball of lint, you could get off a a different, safer stop.

A sudden movement jostled you, rubbing your body between the two toes. Then again, risking it might be worth it to get away from this monstrous foot.

The girl finished up with her other shoe, and began to stand up. You had to decide now.
1133131.title: A quick switch

choices: You were caught up in the chaos
You were left relatively unmolested
11331311.content:
Brianna and Kira parted ways, their steps taking them in opposite directions. For a single second, the hallway was empty.

Then with a shriek the bell rang out the end of passing period. People began pouring in, heading to their classes before teachers marked them truant. Their steps carried them past the girls' lockers, trodding on the dirt left behind. Shoes of all shapes and brands, from sneakers to sandals to Uggs and Keds, it didn't matter; someone was wearing them.

And, as quickly as the herd formed, it dissipated. Classrooms filled, and the hallway emptied. Students had lives to live, after all, regardless of who or what was stepped on.
11331311.title: Passing

choices: ...boot
...sandal
113313111.content:
You watched as the two giant girls both leave you behind at opposite directions. What it a good idea to leave them like that? You try to think of something else to do to get help from anyone around here but you are so tiny that it seems rather impossible. You look across the hallway to see anyone around here maybe someone that look like you could seek help from. The halls were empty and real quiet, maybe you can just hide and wait until you at least someone comes in.

Suddenly, a loud ring almost immediately rings your ears; good thing you covered them quickly. As the bell stops, you heard several doors opened and out came several giants walking to their next classes, unaware of a very tiny guy in their way. You see many kinds of giant footwear crashing down next to you as you try to evade them as fast as you can. Finally you blindly manage to jump right on top of one and try to hold on as hard as you can. When you opened your eyes, you found out that it was a giant...
113313111.title: STAMPEDE!!!!

choices: Agnes is heading to the library
Agnes has a dentist's appointment
Agnes is going home
1133131112.content:
By her nature, Agnes Agnew was not one to rush. She took her time with every act she took, throughout the years of her life. That was probably why she ended up in the sedate role of a school librarian. And also why she waited until the hallways were clear of students before venturing out, slow and deliberate steps taking her on her way.

Another reason she stepped carefully was the sandals she wore; the students always left a mess on the floor before they scurried off to their classes, and she didn't want to step in anything disgusting. Delicately, she moved around the discarded wrappers, balled up papers and unidentified pools. The cleaners really didn't earn their keep, she tutted to herself.

Triumphantly, she avoided getting anything underfoot on her journey. But she may have felt less elated had she realised that a tiny passenger had managed to scramble aboard her left sandal, sharing her journey...
1133131112.title: The Agony of Agnes Agnew

choices: Agnes begins playing with her sandals
Agnes crosses her legs
11331311121.content:
This may have been a mistake is all you can think as you clutch desperately to the side of this woman's leather sandal as she makes her way through the school. With each step she takes the sole of her footwear slaps the sole of her foot with a crack that sounds like thunder splitting the heavens, and when her foot lands on the ground you swear you can feel the entire earth shaking. Her speed as she pushes through the hall causes harsh winds to rush by and whip past you and it's taking everything you have to remain attached to her shoe.

Finally, everything slows down as she pounds into the library, the sudden carpeting absorbing more of the shock of her steps than before. The giant librarian lumbers behind her desk and drags a monolithic chair behind her before plopping down, ready to work. Down below you let out a sigh of relief and prepare to disembark from her sandal, but before you even get the chance--
11331311121.title: Agnes is heading to the library

choices: You're flung off her swinging foot.
You're stuck with her swinging foot.
113313111212.content:
Crossing her legs, Agnes opens powers her computer on and opens the email client. She sighed at the list before her; this was going to take all damn day.

She popped open the library software. Principal wanted a list of students with late fees, pronto. She began to bob her foot, rhythmically in time with the ticking of the wall clock.

An hour went by. It was mind-numbing, just copying names of brats who couldn't be arsed to return their books, one after the other, endlessly. Agnes was a dutiful worker, however, and worked she did. And, to keep still in chair for the whole time she moved her foot. Back and forth, up and down, left and right. Her crossed foot bobbed and swayed, as she clenched her toes and twisted it at the ankle.

To her, it was just some unconscious foot-play. What else could it be?
113313111212.title: Busy work

choices: Agnes' toes snatch you up
You start to run out from beneath her desk
You decide to make your way further in beneath her desk
1133131112121.content:
"GAAAHHH! STOP!!! HELP!!!" you shrieked as you desperately clung to the sandal suspended thousands of feet above the earth. It swung and rotated violently, transforming your once-safeguard into a hellish carnival ride. You couldn't help but puke from the violent motions, the wind whipping your regurgitation and splattering it along the side of her shoe in a dotted stain she would never notice. Above beyond the chaos you could hear her casually typing above. You were of no meaning to this woman, or the world now.

Finally your grip is snatched from you. You scream bloody murder as you're flung to the floor below, skidding across the carpet beneath her desk like a rock skipping on a pond surface. You barely manage to recover before her vacant sandal crashes just behind you with such force that it nearly deafens you. Dust embedded in the old carpet spurts up from the impact and sprays all around you and the winds from the displaced air have no problem picking you up and flinging you even further beneath the woman's desk.

Groaning and sore, you struggle to move and watch wide-eyed as the librarian's enormous foot glides beneath the desk, poking and prodding for its lost shoe. The ground rumbles from the movement and you begin to realize you need to get out of here fast. On the other hand, the forest of twisted computer wires further beneath her desk may make suitable shelter from her shifting feet, and even lead to a better vantage point should you decide to climb them...
1133131112121.title: The Shoe Drops

choices: A student is looking for a book
A teacher is looking for a pupil
A one night stand has come for a booty call
11331311121211.content:
Having spent all day on her feet, Agnes was grateful for the respite. She took precious moments just to luxuriate in sitting, dragging her toes across the thick carpet. It felt so good to have the strands caressing the soles of her feet, the flesh between her toes -

"Miss Agnew? Can you help, please?"

She growled at the interruption, some little squirt eager to get under her feet, and ruin her calm. Still, as a librarian she has trained for this her entire life: with a moment to take her breath and restore her calm, she brings her feet down slowly to push herself upright and walk out from behind her desk.

Whatever could have been worth disturbing her?
11331311121211.title: Raking Across the Coals

choices: You still remain with Brianna
You escape into the band room
11331312.content:
"DoyouwanttogotoCayleen'spartythistomorrowwithme?"

Ted looked up from the sheet music. "What was that?"

"I mean, Cayleen is having that party tomorrow night, and I, was, was, going, and did you, want to got too?" Brianna clutched tightly at her drumsticks. Had she gone too far? Moved too fast? Kira had told her to be confident and to not be afraid to make the first move, but...

The boy's face was impossible to read. For a heartbeat, he remained silent. Sweat began to drip down Brianna's skin. Finally, he spoke.

"I'd love to! What time is it?"

Brianna blinked. Was she dreaming, or did she really score the biggest catch of her freaking life? "It, uh, starts at six. Do you have her address?"

"Yeah, I've been before. Thanks for the invite; it'll be fun." With that, he turned back to the music and resumed studying the notes.

She let a sigh escape her lips. Things were going better than she ever could have expected, all because of her friend's advice. Looking down at her new heels, she let out a quiet whisper: "Thank you, Kira."
11331312.title: It's a date!

choices: She changed to her flats again
She keeps wearing the heels
113313121.content:
High above, you hear the conversation between the giants. You can't really make up most of the words but you can tell it has something to do with some sort of party. You wanted to get off of this girl but you noticed that you don't have the strength to escape so you have no choice but stay here for a while. You don't know how long are you going to be under her feet but you hope it will be quick and maybe she'll try to change back to those flats giving you time to escape.

You looked up again and can make out her blurry face up in the horizon. She is looking at her new heels and you wanted to get her attention on your current spot, but you just know that is nearly impossible to do so due to your lint-sized body.

Suddenly, a loud ring echoed throughout the room and soon felt yourself being lift off slowly from the ground before being slammed down into the ground; it must be time for next class and she's walking right now. This went on for a good 20 or so seconds when she stops. You look up the third time and see that the girl and reunited with her friend again and both began talking about how she managed to talk to the boy from before. You soon realized the reason she changed her shoes: she just wanted to impress her crush. "I guess maybe she won't be needing to wear the heals anymore..." you said as you try to find out about her decision.
113313121.title: A decision

choices: You are headed to sport with Brianna
You're going home with Kira's shoes
1133131212.content:
The rest of the day passed in a blur for Brianna. Ted had said yes! It was going to be amazing! She breezed through the remaining lessons, paying more attention to her new 'lucky shoes' than to any new knowledge.

The only thing that gave her pause was when the final bell rang, and it was time for her football match. Reluctantly, she peeled the heels from her feet to hand back to Kira. "Thanks soooo much! See you at the party tonight?"

"If you can take your eyes off Ted, girlfriend!" Kira giggled with a wink. "Good luck with the soccer!"

Barefoot, Brianna jogged gymward to get changed into her kit, enjoying the freedom of her toes for all the time she would before they would become wrapped tightly in boots.

For her part, Kira swung her heels loosely in her hand as she headed home, wondering if she should just give them to Brianna as a present...
1133131212.title: Sports Time!

choices: You quickly climb top of her feet so you can escape later
You lost your grip and ended up in her cleat
11331312121.content:
Unfortunately for you, you were still stuck to her foot. Apparently, she never took her new shoes off thus making you get stuck to her feet even further. "How am I even going to get out of this mess?" you asked to yourself. When you heard all about this girl going to participate on a soccer match, you just know you have to escape fast before she can. You don't want to get stomped over and over again from her running around the court. Since she's still walking, you just have to wait until she stops.

Finally, you felt her sitting down on a bench so she can change into her cleats. This is your chance! You struggle as hard as you can to remove yourself from her foot. Unfortunately, you were stuck there pretty good but you're not giving up that easily.

Success!

You managed to release your torso part from the foot. You looked at the giantess and realized that she already put her other shoe on and now she's going to put the next one to the foot your still on right now. Now struggling faster, you got your left leg unstuck followed by your right leg. "Yes, I'm free!!!!!" you screamed. (Due to your size, the girl herself did not hear you.)

You looked behind you and suddenly saw her incoming black sock.
11331312121.title: Sticky sole

choices: Her foot
Her hand
113313121211.content:
"Where the hell did I leave it," Coach Ellie said, muttering to herself as she jogged into the locker room. The game was starting in less than ten minutes and for the love of God she could not find her clipboard! The girls could go for a while with the plays they drilled in practice, but if they needed something in particular or if they needed to improvise, then Ellie needed that damn clipboard.

She rummaged through the coach's office, to no avail, and in her desperation she started searching the main locker room. Her pink trainers kicked aside discarded socks and old training bras and sweaty gym bags until she finally spotted it, laying upside-down under a bench. She dropped to her hands and knees and grabbed it.

Then a bit of movement caught her eye. Scurrying across the tarnished cement was a little speck, hardly worth noting. "A bug," she whispered, grimacing at the insect that was so insignificant that she likely wouldn't have seen at if she were standing at full height. For a moment she considered leaving it, since there was a game to get to, but what if it went out and started laying eggs in the lockers? They'd have an infestation soon.

Ignoring how nasty it was, Miss Ellie lifted...
113313121211.title: Found-?

choices: A student athlete comes to go after the soccer game.
A janitor comes to clean the toilets first.
1133131212112.content:
"A bug" was the last thing you needed to hear. You turn and run form the woman, ignoring the rushing tug of air currents as she moves back and stands up. Of course she wouldn't recognize you as a person, not with the kind of day you'd been having.

The world goes dark as you're suddenly crushed between two soft walls. You struggle against the pressure, clawing at ridges in the surfaces until your head pops free, allowing you an unobstructed view along the length of her fingers, up the distance of her arm, and towards the grimace on her face. She was carrying you? Despite yourself, you scream again, shouting "Help me, Miss! I'm not a bug, please don't kill me! Help!"

Despite her lack of response, you keep screaming, ignoring the changing scenery about you, up until the moment she lets go. You watch her and she watches you as you hurdled down, down, down, finally landing with a splash. Disoriented, you nearly dive down further, but the coach's enormous visage serves as a landmark and you find your way to the surface. You gasp for air, nearly missing her final remarks.

"-you're lucky, then you'll be flushed before someone needs to go. Good night!" she says, blowing you a kiss.

Your heart sinks. The porcelain bowl rears over you on all sides, a prison with no escape. Despite knowing that you never be able to climb the slick walls, you know you need to try, and so you paddle over through the uncomfortably salty water.

The white porcelain is cold as you press your hands on it. Under the lip of the toilet the harsh florescent lights can't reach, and you're cast in shadow. Perhaps it's this darkness that finally lets you cry.
1133131212112.title: Sinking spirit

choices: You were splashed in her panties
You were splashed in her buttcrack
You were still in the bowl
11331312121121.content:
Kathryn barged into the bathroom, frantically searching for an open stall. Finding one, she immediately shut and locked the stall door, flipped up the lid, tugged down her pants and panties, and slammed down on the toilet seat. She sighed with relief as her muscles relaxed and released a torrent of piss into the waiting porcelain bowl.

When she finished, Kathryn paused and panted for a moment. She became acutely aware of how much she was sweating, and suddenly felt a brief chill. She shivered, shifted a little on the toilet seat, and waited as the insistent push on her bowels became overwhelming. Then she continued. First came the small logs. They made little splahes in the water that were just big enough to send a tiny plume of toilet water up against her bare buttocks. Kathryn shivered again. She tried to keep going, but only released a string of farts. That didn't mean it was over, though. She could feel something else coming, deeper in her rectum. And so she sat there, trying to keep her mind off the cold by mentally replaying the game.

After a while, just ever so slightly before she could relieve herself totally, Kathryn shifted and lifted a buttock to scratch underneath it. As she settled back down, she wondered if she really was as smelly as some people claimed. To test it out, she sniffed her armpit. Not great, but not bad either. Then maybe they meant her...

The log was very insistent now. And, unfortunately, it was very big. Kathryn suddenly regretted eating all that pizza yesterday. She strained and grunted, flexing her powerful gluteal muscles, but there was just so much crap. Kathryn started breathing through her teeth as she kept forcing it out. She gave one final push and...

SPLASH!

A wave of water rose where her turd landed, soaking Kathryn's ass and even going between her thighs and into her panties, which where around her ankles. Kathryn groaned, and reached for what she knew would be toilet paper that was little more than a long tissue... And there was none. Kathryn ground her teeth in agitation. Well, there was nothing else to do but face the music. She stood up and pulled up her clothes, shuddering at the wetness, which caused her rump to jiggle. Then she turned to consider her handiwork. Hell, it'd be a miracle if that thing flushed! But then, wasn't her, wasn't her problem. She lightly tugged the lever, unlatched the door, and walked out. During the whole experience, she hadn't said a word.
11331312121121.title: Enter Kathryn

11333.content:
It honestly hadn't mattered who's shoe you were standing on. As soon as the two teens got close, their pounding steps shook you clean off and right onto the floor. You tried to move, of course, but that also hadn't mattered.

The girl's foot found you first, kicking you and sending you spinning. Then it came down, turning the left side of your body to mush under her flat. It missed your head though, leaving you a screaming mess, thoughts fogged by pain you hadn't ever considered possible.

Then she left. As he jammed his foot into the shoe, it slid just a bit to his left. That was more than enough, placing his shoe's heel right over your ruined body. The sole, worn nearly smooth by repeated use, came down. There were a few rocks stuck in little cracks and crevasses, and what remained of your rational mind hoped beyond hope that you'd get caught and saved, trapped but unflattened.

You weren't. The rubber was unyielding as it came down, and the rest of your remains were turned into a red splotch.

Some of it stuck to the sole, but the rest remained among the footwear. It was trampled upon by sock, shoe, and bare foot alike in the next week, until it stopped resembling even a blood stain.


Good try though.
11333.title: In the way

choices: You decide to hang around in the living room until someone gets back
You try to head upstairs to wait
You head to the kitchen to feed your hunger
You dedicate your time to devising a method to communicate with the macro world
You make your way outside
12.content:
Morning in the Stevenson household is like morning anywhere else. Jenna and Tim wake up earlier than they'd like; they briefly squabble over who has to go grab the paper (Jenna loses the argument this time. Tim probably will tomorrow), and then they go wake the kids. Emily's easy -- seven years old isn't too bad. The oldest two, however, are much tougher. Brianna is 14 and Jake is 16, and neither one wakes up before noon willingly.

Still, it's not that bad. At least their schedules are reasonably in sync. Tim leaves around 7:30 for the office, followed by Jenna at 8:15 -- she drops Emily on the way in to work. The teens are both in high school now, and Jake can drive, so they take off at 8:30 -- not that Jake likes driving his sister into school, but since he'd lose his car if he didn't, he puts up with it.

And so they gather 'round the breakfast table, with the older teens sullen and sleep-deprived, Emily her usual bundle of energy, and Tim and Jenna trying to impose order on the day.

"So, what's going on after school?" Jenna asks, pouring milk on Emily's cereal.

"I have soccer practice," Brianna yawns.

"Great. Do I have to wait around for her?" complains Jake.

"No, I can pick her up. What are you doing, though, that it's an issue?" asks Tim.

"He's got a date tonight," says Brianna.

"It's just a...thing," mutters Jake.

The conversation continues on for a moment, until Tim has to go to work; he walks over to the shoes, bends down, and slips his foot into the first half of his pair of dress shoes. He looks down at the second, and slides that on, too. Straightening up, he opens up the door, and heads out to his car, yawning and quickly closing the door behind him.

***

"Bye Mom. I'm taking Twerp-anna to school," Jake calls from the doorway.

"Don't call me that, Jerkwad." The teenage girl angrily shoved her feet in her flats, storming away to the car before Jake could reply.

He watched after her. It was waaay too easy to set her off. He slipped his skate shoes on, not bothering with the laces. They were practically falling apart, anyways, with the sole peeling off and the fabric on the inside shredding freshly with every step. He'd been meaning to get new shoes for a while now, and with his date tonight... Maybe he'd stop at a shoe store on the way home from school.

Brianna was sitting in the passenger seat and looking out the window by the time he got there. "Ready to go, sis?"

"Don't talk to me."

Jake shook his head as the engine turned over.

***

"Kids," Jenna says, as her two oldest children depart. Walking over to the door, she spots a piece of lint on her pantyhose. Wrinkling her face, she flicks it off. It drifts slowly down, setting in her red pump. She can't help but feel for the lint, but her thoughts are interrupted as Emily rushes down the stairs. "Okay Mom, let's go."

The two are out the door and in the car before you could count to three. She drops Emily off at school, and watches as she skips through the schoolyard toward the door. Where do kids get that kind of energy?

Chuckling to herself, she heads off to work.

***

The house was empty of people, after each of the inhabitants passed through the hall and kitchen, not a single one so much as stepping into the living room. Should any tiny, shrunken people be inside the building (as if!) they'd have to pass the entire day free from the influence of giant humans, at the mercy of whatever other risks may exist, usually far beneath the notice of a normal...
12.title: Empty House...  Or Is Someone Home Alone?

choices: Jenna comes home early, with an ill Emily
Brianna comes home early, skipping school
Tim comes home early, with his mistress
121.content:
No. now that you're in the quiet, alone, you're going to spend some time getting used to this new world. Adjust to your condition, see what your strengths and limitations are.

Scrambling over the tough strands of carpet fibre is difficult, as each gap between them is a drop you have to carefully step over. There's no way you'd be able to pick up the pace to a run without great risk of stumbling, and hurting yourself.

The scenery is as baffling as the staircase and shoes were when you first awoke here, outrageously out of scale with your perceptions, cyclopean structures of unknowable design.

Trekking through the room, you come across a fallen tree, a thick, curved black trunk barring your path. You ponder it for moments, walking around to see how it was rooted in the ground, only to notice a pale ball of matter at its end. Wait... This isn't a tree, it's a discarded eyelash, and it alone is huge to you!

A sobering thought indeed, and you hurry on your way. Perhaps too quickly, as you do indeed trip and fall.

No harm done, but as you get up again, you see it's not a carpet strand you've tripped over, but a white rock about the size of your head. One that has a pair of large holes in one side, dropping off to a series of smaller stones in sequence...

It's a human skull.

You're not the first here! At least one other people has been shrunk and ended up in this house, only to met a horrible fate. And now their remains are scattered unknowingly about this family's home, too small to even be sucked up by a vacuum cleaner.

You don't know how long you spend sitting there, contemplating the implications.

But then movement registers at the periphery of your vision, and you turn to see a figure approaching. A figure of your scale! Is this a mirage?

The wild-haired old man, with a full beard and unkempt hair, stalks forward steadily, avoiding pitfalls with a practised gait. He doesn't seem as surprised to see you as you are to see him, merely giving you a nod as he speaks.

"Another one."

"Oh my God! Am I glad to see you!" you gush, moving over to check that he's real. "How many more of you are there here?"

"It's just me," he growls. "Used to be more, but no-one ever lasts long here. I've seen so many die over the years, and even more just disappear..."

"Years..? How long-"

"Figure it's nigh on twenty years. I appeared here just in time to see a young man carry his blushing bride over the threshold into their first home. Gods striding over me, telling me in one instant what my life was going to be like. Guess that's why I lived so long: I got to adapt slowly as the family grew, change my routine for each new child. If you get dropped into this house of five people, you'll be overwhelmed."

"That can't be it. You must have some special set of skills-!"

"Time was, I used to be an outdoorsman. And that's helped me survive here, indoors." A cracked smile edges its way between the masses of hair on his face. "That's the joke I tell every new arrival."

"Huh. So... what is there to eat around here? Ants?"

"HA! I wish I were big enough to take on an ant. You keep clear of them; they're built like tanks, and will take you apart in moments. That's why it's best to stay inside, since there're things so much worse than ants out there... What were we talking about?"

"Food. I'm kinda hungry..."

"Oh. I mainly get by on dust mites, spiced up a little with whatever skin flakes the gods see fit to drop my way. This quiet time, when they've taken their holy presence away, is the safest time to scavenge. I have the run of the house, so long as no one comes home early!"
121.title: There Is Another

choices: You decided to approach the behemoths.
You're still cowering in fear under the cabinets.
Something happened to you....
13.content:
Morning in the Stevenson household is like morning anywhere else. Jenna and Tim wake up earlier than they'd like; they briefly squabble over who has to go grab the paper (Jenna loses the argument this time. Tim probably will tomorrow), and then they go wake the kids. Emily's easy -- seven years old isn't too bad. The oldest two, however, are much tougher. Brianna is 14 and Jake is 16, and neither one wakes up before noon willingly.

Still, it's not that bad. At least their schedules are reasonably in sync. Tim leaves around 7:30 for the office, followed by Jenna at 8:15 -- she drops Emily on the way in to work. The teens are both in high school now, and Jake can drive, so they take off at 8:30 -- not that Jake likes driving his sister into school, but since he'd lose his car if he didn't, he puts up with it.

And so they gather 'round the breakfast table, with the older teens sullen and sleep-deprived, Emily her usual bundle of energy, and Tim and Jenna trying to impose order on the day.

"So, what's going on after school?" Jenna asks, pouring milk on Emily's cereal.

"I have soccer practice," Brianna yawns.

"Great. Do I have to wait around for her?" complains Jake.

"No, I can pick her up. What are you doing, though, that it's an issue?" asks Tim.

"He's got a date tonight," says Brianna.

"It's just a...thing," mutters Jake.

The conversation continues on for a bit, until Tim gets up to go to work. They have no idea it's been watched...
13.title: The Most Important Meal of the Day

choices: black socks of the dad.
bare feet of the teen girl.
panty hose-clad feet of the mom.
131.content:
As soon as the first people wander into the kitchen -- a giant woman and a less giant, but still enormous little girl -- you realize this is going to be a lot harder than you thought it would be. The woman is pretty -- a trim, attractive woman in a grey business suit -- and the girl is cute -- a six year old, maybe, wearing jeans and a t-shirt -- but you have little time to recognize that, as they both appear to be more mountain than human.

The mom gets food around for the daughter; soon enough, a man in black socks, slacks, and a dress shirt arrives, followed by a younger man in jeans, socks, and an oversized t-shirt, followed by a teen girl in a skirt and blouse.

All of them are enormous beyond words. Which may be precisely why you find yourself drawn across the room toward the table of the gods.

They ignore you like the insect you are as you reach the pole that holds the table aloft. You goggle as you look at the feet and legs that dominate the world here. Any one of them could kill you with a sidestep. Even the youngest, who balances her toes on the ground.

You decide that the best option you have is to get close to one of them. You rule out the youngest girl -- even if you get her attention, she probably won't help. But the others might.

The younger man is furthest from you. You can't count on him staying still through breakfast, and frankly, you don't trust him to. But the older man -- the dad, probably -- he's right by you. The eldest daughter is the other person sitting by you; you could also approach her, but her legs are bare. It would be easier to climb the panty hose that the mom wears -- it's like a virtual ladder. But you have to cross in front of the little girl to get there.

You decide to throw caution to the wind. There's no sense waiting here forever, and besides, breakfast could be done any minute. You head for the....
131.title: Approaching the Enormous Family

choices: Brianna catches the man as she scrunches her toes
Brianna brings her heel down on the man
Brianna smacks the man to one side as she rotates at the ankle
1312.content:
Brianna had a big soccer match after school, and it almost entirely filled her mind as she sat at the breakfast table. But rather than her team-mates, or the foes they were due to play, the most pressing matter was the shoes.

The football boots were very confining, and so she spent the morning preparing her feet for the experience, keeping them bare for as long as possible. Even here, she was constantly flexing the toes, stretching them out and down. She rotated her ankles, maximising their mobility for the challenge ahead. There was a lot riding on the match, and she wanted to be in perfect form.

Little did she know that a speck of a man was approaching her restless feet, and that she was going to contact him in a most painful manner...
1312.title: Footballin' Feet

choices: She goes to put on her cleats
She goes to the table to eat breakfast
Reader's Choice
13121.content:
As you approached Bianna's foot, the first thing you noticed is how her ankles seemed to tower into the air. Climbing her leg would be no picnic. The shaved stubs of her leg hairs would make climbing difficult. You also decided it was best to approach the toes, to avoid being crushed outright. You walked up to her middle toe, noticing a very faint, earthy aroma.

There were plenty of ridges for you to grab as you started your ascent. Which made for easy climbing. Before long you were pulling yourself up onto her toenail and walking across her toe. Just then though, her foot shifted, and the movement of her toe through you off balance. You screamed as you fell between the crevice of her toes as the foot scrunched up.

You thought you were about to die, but instead, a bit of pressure pushed you against the webbing of her toe. Her stretching seemed to work up a little bit of sweat. Not enough to notice normally, but at your size, it made her skin a bit sticky. You tried to fight against the gross skin, but then held onto the skin for dear life as her face raised up, then slammed down again. From your perspective, you could see the ground was just a few feet below you, but letting go risked getting crushed to death, so you held on.
13121.title: Trapped by Brianna

choices: Bite her toes (gross)
Kiss her toes (retch)
Tickle her toes (yuk)
131213.content: How do you get her attention?
131213.title: Reader's Choice

13122.content:
As you approach Brianna's foot, you were able to appreciate just how small you actually were. You could see every patch of rough skin, every callous, and her foot seemed capable of covering a football field. Still, you knew if you didn't get someone's attention soon, you could very well end up dead. As you approach the foot, which to you seemed almost a dozen yards away, the behemoth began to move.

Brianna had pivoted her foot, and was standing on the balls of her feet. To her, the motion was probably trivial. But from your point of view, it looked like her heel just rose several stories into the air. You start to back up as you felt things had suddenly gotten too dangerous. But it was too late, as her heel twisted over in your direction. You started to run as you saw her foot start to lower, but it was too little, too late. You could feel the air pressure around you change, just before her massive heel came down on you, first pushing you to the ground. You had only moments to come to terms with the fact that you were about to die before you entered nothingness, your body crushed to a smear under her foot. Near microscopic blood was spread across the kitchen floor as she moved across the room, the only proof that you were ever there.
13122.title: Brianna brings her heel down on the man

choices: You were grabbed by Emily's toes during breakfast.
You are on Jenna's legs as she's heading to work.
You were the piece of lint she carelessly discarded.
1313.content:
"Emily, stop that kicking," Jenna said to her daughter. Honestly, she could be a handful sometimes.

The family finishes breakfast in a timely manner, and Tim leaves for work. As the children head upstairs to change for school, Jenna takes a moment to clean up. She's already dressed, after all.

"Bye Mom. I'm taking Twerp-anna to school," Jake calls to his mother. Jenna vaguely hears Brianna's complaint about the name. She sighs. "Kids," she mutters to herself.

Walking over to the door, she spots a piece of lint on her pantyhose. Wrinkling her face, she flicks it off. It drifts slowly down, setting in her red pump. She can't help but feel for the lint, but her thoughts are interrupted as Emily rushes down the stairs. "Okay Mom, let's go."

The two are out the door and in the car before you could count to three. Dropping her daughter off at school, she heads to work.
1313.title: And we're off!

choices: Emily's first lesson of the day was PE
Emily's first lesson of the day was storytime
13131.content:
You weren't certain what was the worst part of this whole ordeal; being snatched by the massive fleshy pillars, or being small enough to call a girl's toes "massive fleshy pillars."

Maybe five, ten minutes have passed after you failed to sneak past the young (but not little) girl, but they've a bitch to live through. Her toes didn't just move; they writhed. Up and down, left and right, back and forth, you were pressed between two of the lesser toes, treated as a bit of sock lint.

And that was before she put the socks on. Stuck to her clammy flesh, you were helpless to do anything more than watch as she clumsily slid the white fabric over. You'd hoped to be dislodged, but her skin refused to let go. The sock went on, you remained stuck, and the foot was cast into darkness.

Every step she took hurt, but your prison kept your from the brunt of it. Had you been under her sole, you likely wouldn't have survived this long. Maybe. Actually, you were surprised you were still alive right now. The prison only got tighter once she put shoes on, and that was actually quite a while ago. Sure, it hurt like a mother fucker, but you were still alive and kicking.

Well, you weren't the one doing the kicking. That would be your captor. Through bursts of pain and flexes of toes, you couldn't help but wonder what was going on in the world above...
13131.title: Taken captive

choices: Hell in the shoe
You somehow got out of the sock while Emily was changing
131311.content:
Emily ran into the girls changing room and found an empty locker to put her stuff in. She put her bag down and started changing into her PE clothes when her friend Riley went to the locker next to her.
"You excited for PE? I heard we're playing kickball today!" Riley said with excitement.
"Ya! It's going to be so much fun I've been wanting to play" Emily finished getting changed and sat on the bench to talk with her friend. "I hope we're on the same team"
"Ya it'll be so much more fun if we are" both girls walked out of the locker room into the gym and waited in their spots for class to start. The teacher came and announced they were playing kickball and explained some basics for the kids and put everyone into two teams, Emily and Riley being put on the same team. After everyone knew who was on their team the teacher started the game.
131311.title: PE fun

choices: You were caught up in the painting
You were not on the polish
131312.content:
In the back of the classroom, behind rows of kids sitting cross-legged on the floor, Mia Hooper was taking her shoes off to show her friend Emily her painted toe nails. "My mommy helped me with them. Isn't they beautiful?"

They were more than just beautiful to Emily. The purple sparkly polish on the first grader's toes was a sign of adulthood and poor little Emily, the youngest of her family, really wanted to be all grown up. "You're so lucky. Mommy won't let me get painted nails."

"Do you want some nail paint? I took the bottle." Indeed she had, as she plucked the little glass container from her back pocket. "Let's do it right now!"

Emily looked up towards the front of the room. Their teacher this year was rather new, and often failed at keeping the kids under control. Now was no exception, as many kids were playing with each other or absorbed in some other activities. "Yeah! Let's paint my nails!"

And so Emily stripped her feet bare, and the two girls worked with the polish. Finally, after grueling minutes of work, they had all ten toes sparkling purple. It wasn't as neat and tidy as Mia's pedicure, but to Emily it was the most beautiful thing in the world.

Later in the day, Emily began to have second thoughts. Her mommy hadn't outright forbidden nail polish, but it wasn't something she'd normally let her young daughter have. How would she react to it? Emily began to nervously kneed her sock between her toes. She'd have to be sneaky until the paint faded away.
131312.title: Renegade

choices: Jenna failed to notice the nail polish
Jenna is not happy that Emily has nail polish
1313121.content:
Breathing damp air through microscopic cracks, baked in a space nearing one hundred degrees, and unable to move anything but the fingers of your left hand, you still had to admit that it was impressive how small you were. Let's face it, to be both completely over powered by a first grader's toes was one thing, but to be further undetected as the girls stared right at you? Just goddamn impressive.

When you had felt the shoe and sock being removed, you had clung to her toenail, hopeful to be detected and helped. But despite both of the girls (you're pretty sure Emily was your captor and Mia was her friend, but it was hard to hear over your screams) looking at your location, they didn't spot you. Instead, they ran a tree sized purple nail brush over the landscape of Emily's toe. It had hit you pretty hard, and for a good long while your right arm had burned with intense pain. Now though, the polish had dried, and you were stuck on your back, coated ever so thickly in sparkly paint.

If there was any positive to this, at least you weren't still between her toes. Your new prison was still terribly claustrophobic, but at least the pressure was less. Of course every little shake Emily made rattled you to your core, so it wasn't exactly a vacation from the torment.

Light suddenly blinded you as the girl took off her sock. The world outside rushed by in a mess of colors, but once her foot settled on the carpet, you were able to focus. Her leg had no right to be as long as it was, shooting off into the heavens above. Seems like your eyes were left uncovered too.

Motion again as she greeted her parents and ran upstairs, then stillness. Her eye filled the horizon as she looked at you. As she looked at the paint. It was hard to remember just how little you were to her.

"How do I get you off..." She was muttering to herself, likely about your purple prison. She just got these nails done; why would she want them undone? You watch as she sticks her thumb in her mouth, then moves the glistening digit towards you. Oh my god, she was going to try and rub you off her toes.

Earlier you had considered your leftmost fingers the luck part, as they were sticking above the polish and thus free to move. Now they were most certainly unlucky, with the giant pad of the girl's thumb grinding them back and forth along the nail. You tried to scream, but your mouth was still glued shut. Tears welled in your eyes, but Emily's spit flooded off her skin and drowned them out. And, despite how brutally she ravaged the free bits of your body, the paint remained untouched.

Emily stuck her thumb in her mouth once more, ready to go for round two, when the sound of an opening door hits both of your ears. She rockets back to full height, curling her toes to hide the color in the carpeting.

You can't see, but it's clear from the tone of her mother's voice that...
1313121.title: Pedi-curse

choices: "...but we should take it off now. We'll do it fancy this weekend."
"...I guess it won't hurt to leave it on...."
13131212.content:
"Emily, I need to get your...what are you doing?"

"Um...nothing, mom."

"'Nothing.' Really," Jenna says, stepping forward. "And why are your toes curled?"

Emily rubs her foot against the carpet, and finally, says, "Mia had nail polish and she asked if I wanted my toes done and I said yeah but then I knew you'd be mad so I was tryin' to get it off but I couldn't and I'm sorry, I just wanted to be grown up."

Jenna bites her lip to keep from laughing. Her "no toenail polish" rule for Emily is primarily designed to keep her carpet intact. She didn't want her daughter to get the idea that she could just put on toenail polish any time she wanted. Still, it was about this age that Brianna started trying to put toenail polish on, and frankly, about this age Jenna had.

"I appreciate you being honest, young lady," Jenna said. "You know you are not supposed to put on nail polish, right?"

"Right," Emily says, sadly, dragging her toes along the ground.

"Okay. Bedtime is five minutes early tonight," Jenna says. "And Emily...if you are good until this weekend, I will paint your fingernails and toenails. But only if you're good."

Emily looks up, and literally jumps for joy. "Thanks, mom! You're the best mom ever!" she says, running to embrace her mother.

Jenna laughs. "You're growing up, sprout. You just need to ask before you do things, okay? Now, let me see those nails."

Emily hops up on the bed, and sticks her foot out. Jenna looks over the inartful job; she suspects strongly that there's more than a little nail polish on the carpet at school. "Well, it's a pretty color," she said....
13131212.title: Trouble

choices: The mom tells her to wait for her nails to be done.
The mom tell her that's fine.
131312121.content:
You look up the massive leg of the kid for two seconds, before the floor you're plastered to turns vertical, then more-than vertical, as she slides you into the carpet. You're buffeted by carpet fibers and dust as the girl grinds you against it. You don't know what the hell she's doing, you're just glad that for the moment, she isn't breaking your fingers.

Distantly, you hear a contralto voice call, "...need to get your...what are you doing?"

"Nothing, Mom," calls the voice above, much closer, much louder, though still faraway, drifting from the top of the mountainous kid.

"...really...why...toes curled?"

The girl stops, and suddenly her toes spring back out. You hear her rattling on about painting her nails, and you realize that she must have been trying to hide it from her mom, which explains why she tried to drown and/or crush you.

"...appreciate you...honest, young....know you are not...nail polish, right?"

"Right," the girl bellows, dragging you against the ground once more. There is one saving grace, though; a bit of rock -- probably a sand grain -- is caught by the toe you're plastered to. It grinds against the polish loudly, screeching as she moves her toes by. For a second, you're afraid it will cut you in two, but instead, it manages to chip the polish, just a tiny bit. Not enough to free you -- that would be silly -- but enough that your face, neck, and left shoulder are finally free. You breathe in gratefully, and with the noise dying down, you catch the end of the discussion.

"...will paint your fingernails and toenails. But only if you're good."

"Thanks mom! You're the best mom ever!" The voice precedes your world suddenly lurching upward, then slamming back down, rattling your bones. Then there are a few quick steps, each one shaking you to the core. You are approaching another pair of feet, even bigger than your host's; the giants collide in a hug, with the girl's toes atop the mom's. You whimper, as you stare up at the infinity of the girl, and the greater infinity of the mom.

"You're growing up, sprout. You just need to ask before you do things, okay? Now, let me see those nails."

Thank God! Maybe you're saved after all! The girl bounds again, and you shake anew as she leaps up onto something -- the bed, probably, but at this point, who cares? -- and lifts you skyward.

The enormous woman steps forward, each step a thunderclap, and then drops to her knees. You are awed to see the foot you are on is pointed at breast-level for the moment; the size of each one is remarkable, and you're almost turned on for the quarter-second you watch them undulate. Then the mom leans in closer, peering down at you. No, the toes. She's peering down at the toes.

A huge green eye sweeps over your position. You can feel the humid air from her nose with each breath she takes. You know it's hopeless, but you scream anyhow, hoping against hope she'll notice.

"Well, it's a pretty color," she says, so loud at this distance that your ears hurt from the noise. "But we should take it off now. We'll do it fancy this weekend."

"Aw!" the girl complains.

"Thank God," you say.

"Now, you know the rules. I think I'm being pretty nice, aren't I?" the woman says.

"Yes, mom."

"Okay. I'll go get the nail polish remover," the mom says, and you suddenly realize that this might be a bad thing. That stuff is really poisonous. Granted, you're tiny, and you probably should already be done from the paint, so you don't know what it will do to you, but you don't want to find out. But before you can dwell on it too much, you hear something from the girl that makes the chemical sound like nothing.

"Can I take my bath first?"
131312121.title: Paint/Off

choices: "...you have dance class in an hour."
"...you need to take a bath before dinner."
"...your dad and I are going out, Briana's babysitting tonight."
