Thank God! Maybe you're saved after all! The girl bounds again, and you shake anew as she leaps up onto something -- the bed, probably, but at this point, who cares? -- and lifts you skyward.

The enormous woman steps forward, each step a thunderclap, and then drops to her knees. You are awed to see the foot you are on is pointed at breast-level for the moment; the size of each one is remarkable, and you're almost turned on for the quarter-second you watch them undulate. Then the mom leans in closer, peering down at you. No, the toes. She's peering down at the toes.

A huge green eye sweeps over your position. You can feel the humid air from her nose with each breath she takes. You know it's hopeless, but you scream anyhow, hoping against hope she'll notice.

"Well, it's a pretty color," she says, so loud at this distance that your ears hurt from the noise. And then she says something that makes you cry out in anguish.

"I guess it won't hurt to leave it on."

"Yay!" the giant girl shouts, and now the world is motion again as the two giants collide.

"All right, now go ahead and play for a bit," the mom bellows. "And remember...."
131312122.title: No Help from the Mom

choices: You remain stuck to the nail
During the bath, you break free
1313121222.content:
Jenna stood over the bubbly tub, running water over her hand to check the temperature. Emily stood behind her, naked as the day she was born and ready to take her bath. "Alright sweety, are you ready?"

"Yes mommy!" Emily dropped her toys (beach party Barbies) in the tub, then hopped in after. The purple toes disappeared beneath the foamy surface of the bubble bath.

Jenna grabbed a washrag and poured body soap into it. "Okay Emily, we've got to get you clean."

"Mom! Cynthia called! She wants to talk to you!" The voice came, loud

Over her shoulder, Jenna called back, "Alright Jake! On my way." Turning to Emily, she said, "Wash yourself, okay? Don't forget behind your ears and between your toes. I'll be back." The washrag was handed over, and the mother left the room.

The moment the bathroom door closed, Emily lifted her feet up above the foamy surface and set them on the side of the tub. Even while they were soaking wet and covered in bath foam, the painted nails were the coolest thing to the little girl.

The bath took half an hour. Emily alternated between playing with the dolls and washing up. She did a pretty good job of getting clean, but she purposely went easy near her feet. No need to risk the polish, after all.
1313121222.title: Splish splash

choices: You come unstuck during dinner.
You come unstuck after dinner, but before bed.
You're stuck at least until bedtime.
13131212221.content:
You've been screaming ever since the mom said the word "bath," but it's done you no good. The titanic girl you're stuck to half-walked, half-skipped to the bathroom, each footfall shaking your core. You hear a sudden cascade, as if Niagara Falls suddenly switched on. You try to see, when suddenly, a massive form drops on you, blotting out the world.

It only lasts a second, and you and the foot slide back through the leg of the girl's jeans. Then another form -- not as massive, but still mammoth -- drops on you -- and again, you slip back.

You close your eyes, not wanting to look at the enormous naked girl above you. But you don't have much choice -- you have to know where you are. Have to hope against hope that you can hold onto enough air to survive this. Maybe break free -- but you aren't sure you want to, not in the rapidly filling ocean of the bathtub.

The girl stops over and grabs some toys from a bin by the tub -- Barbies, you see, each one a giant in their own right. Then you hear the mom say words you prayed wouldn't come.

"All right, sweetie, are you ready?"

"Yes, mommy!" the girl bellows. She tosses the toys in ahead of her, each splashing mightily. Then she lifts you and her foot up, and you try to hold your breath as she plunges you into the depths.

The impact of the foot on porcelain forces the air out of you, and you gasp reflexively, the water filling your lungs. This is it, you're going to drown....

Except you don't.

You should have. By the time she pulls her toes and you out, and props you on the edge of the tub, you should have been at least unconscious. And while she spends a great deal of time keeping you elevated, she also spends a great deal of time playing with her Barbies, walking them along the enormous island that is her torso. And when she does this, you go back under.

It hurts, mind you. It feels like you're going to drown, each time, but you don't. By the time, a half-hour later, that she steps out of the tub and starts drying herself, you realize that you must be more durable than normal. It stands to reason, really; you should have been crushed a dozen times over already. You don't think you're invincible or immortal...and you don't want to try and find out. But at least you're able to survive when you shouldn't.

Emily bounds into her room, and happily, you're finally spared having to gaze upon a naked kid as she gets dressed in shorts and a t-shirt.

You're alive, and that's something. But you are still stuck to Emily's toenail. It could be worse, but it sure could be better.

As if to drive the point home, Emily bounces back onto the floor and heads out of her room, probably to dinner.
13131212221.title: Stuck On You

choices: You successfully grabbed a Barbie.
You grabbed onto Emily.
You fail, and are sucked into the vortex.
13131212222.content:
You've been screaming ever since the mom said the word "bath," but it's done you no good. The titanic girl you're stuck to half-walked, half-skipped to the bathroom, each footfall shaking your core. You hear a sudden cascade, as if Niagara Falls suddenly switched on. You try to see, when suddenly, a massive form drops on you, blotting out the world.

It only lasts a second, and you and the foot slide back through the leg of the girl's jeans. Then another form -- not as massive, but still mammoth -- drops on you -- and again, you slip back.

You close your eyes, not wanting to look at the enormous naked girl above you. But you don't have much choice -- you have to know where you are. Have to hope against hope that you can hold onto enough air to survive this. Maybe break free -- but you aren't sure you want to, not in the rapidly filling ocean of the bathtub.

The girl stops over and grabs some toys from a bin by the tub -- Barbies, you see, each one a giant in their own right. Then you hear the mom say words you prayed wouldn't come.

"All right, sweetie, are you ready?"

"Yes, mommy!" the girl bellows. She tosses the toys in ahead of her, each splashing mightily. Then she lifts you and her foot up, and you try to hold your breath as she plunges you into the depths.

The impact of the foot on porcelain forces the air out of you, and you gasp reflexively, the water filling your lungs. This is it, you're going to drown....

Except you don't.

You should have. By the time she pulls her toes and you out, and props you on the edge of the tub, you should have been at least unconscious. And while she spends a great deal of time keeping you elevated, she also spends a great deal of time playing with her Barbies, walking them along the enormous island that is her torso. And when she does this, you go back under.

It hurts, mind you. It feels like you're going to drown, each time, but you don't.

Emily is currently engaged in playing, and she isn't paying much attention to her toes...for the moment. She taps the toe you're stuck to against the side of the tub just slightly harder than she meant to, and the cheap polish cracks, just a tiny bit.

If she'd struck just a micron or two to the right or left, it would be irrelevant. But this crack was perfectly placed. A few metallic flakes peel off, and a tiny chunk of paint -- not enough for the girl to even notice.

But enough that your upper torso is freed.

Moments later, an idle swish of the girl's foot finishes the job, and you're expelled into an ocean of water, free...for a certain value of free.

Of course, you're still knee-high to an ant, and swimming in a bathtub the size of a small sea. You're in a huge amount of trouble.

On instinct, you swim to the surface. It's tough even to break through the surface tension, and once you do, you're not sure it helps. You can see the girl's massive form, but only partially -- enormous islands of bubbles surround you like icebergs, and the water continues to chop.

You know that in a few minutes, the girl will be done with her bath. You have to escape. So you begin to swim.

Finally, you spot something that gives you hope -- an enormous body off in the distance. Not the girl's -- it's one of her Barbie dolls, floating face down. With every ounce of your strength, you dig for it, and then, suddenly, it's racing toward you. But....

Oh God, the girl has sat up in the bathtub and is leaning forward to pull the plug. You collide with the Barbie, and try to hang on, but the entire world is chaos. You bounce off the girl's flesh -- you don't even want to know what part of her it is -- and then again off a wall of plastic. You hit something again, and try to hold on to it with all your might.
13131212222.title: Innundated

choices: You're in the dollhouse
You're in the tub
131312122221.content:
Emily looked at the two barbies laying in the draining bathtub. Mommy had told her to leave bath toys in the bathroom, but that wasn't fair to them! Grabbing one of the set, she hid it in the towel she'd been handed. "I'm going to get dressed now Mommy!"


Jenna sighed as Emily took the Barbie upstairs. Her little girl was on quite the rebellious streak today. If this kept up, she'd have to have a talk with her.

Turning the lights off in the bathroom, she left the other Barbie alone in the dark tub.


Entering her room, Emily slammed the door shut and pulled her doll from the towel. It was Stacie, her favorite of the beach set. Still dripping wet, Emily padded over to the large dollhouse in the corner of the room. "Here you go. Play nice with the others!"

Walking over to her bed, she grabbed the shorts and shirt here mother had laid out. All dressed, she headed downstairs for dinner.
131312122221.title: Dolly

choices: Stuck to her finger when she went to eat dinner
You fell into her pajamas
131312122222.content:
Emily dragged her hand through the water, pretending it was a shark, and pulled the plug. She put her bath toys away and got out of the bath and her mom dried her off and she got dressed in her pajamas.
"What's for dinner mommy?"
"Hotdogs, fries, and Mac and cheese"
After Emily pulled up her pajama pants she ran down stairs and sat at the table in her normal spot. Dinner went pretty uneventfully and Emily just thought about playing with her dolls before bed whenever her mom was talking to her siblings and talked about how excited she was for her mom to do her nails finally. After dinner Emily put her plate in the sink and ran off to go play for a bit before bed.
"Aren't you forgetting something Emily?" Her dad said as she reached her room.
"Brush my teeth"
"Get to it and then you can play for a few minutes before bed"
Emily turned around and went into the bathroom and brushed her teeth (quickly doing the ABC's in her head) and ran into her room to play. After ten minutes she heard her mom shout
"Time for bed Emily, I'll be up in a bit to tuck you in"
"Okay mommy" Emily grabbed her teddy bear and hopped into bed, a couple seconds later her mom came in and tucked her in and kissed her forehead goodnight and Emily fell asleep shortly after.
But question is... Where were you during all this?
131312122222.title: Dinner and bed

choices: Front of her panties all night.
Back of her panties all night.
1313121222222.content:
Back and forth you bounced off Emily and the Barbie. Just as Emily goes to stand up, you see her massive inner thigh come raising up from the depths below as it pulls you out of the water with it. You're sent cascading down the young girls thigh, towards her inner knee before you caught glimpse of the only thing that can save you, a bandage. She must have scraped her knee and forgot to take the bandage off before the bath. Reaching out you manage to grab the adhesive in a last ditch effort to avoid being sucked down the drain.

Emily swings her leg over the side of the bathtub and you're hit with an incredible amount of G-force, the fact you didn't lose consciousness is probably contributed to your size. Coming to a stop, you watch as Emily grabs a towel and you brace yourself as she dries off, gripping the bandage as hard as you can, each swipe of the towel making it more difficult to hang on. You celebrate as you see Emily place the towel on the rack, you honestly didn't think you'd manage to hang on but your celebration is short lived as you see Emily grab a pair of panties and pajama bottoms.

You brace yourself even harder as you watch the giant girl slip her panties around her right foot before shifting her balance to get them around her left as well. These panties were mostly white with pink trim, there was a picture of the cartoon mascot on the front and appeared to be well worn by a child of her age. The front of the panties with the mascots picture was supposed to be pure white but had a yellow hue to it, most likely from the girl wetting the bed. As for the back, there was a light brown streak from what you assumed would have been a poorly wiped butt crack.

An audible gulp rings out from your throat as you imagine these panties must be almost a year old, which means they're probably a size to small for her. With not a whole lot of time, you had no choice, hanging onto the bandage would do you no good, and if you fell now, you'd probably get stomped flat by the humongous child. Your only option was to try and leap for the waistband of her panties as she pulls them up so you can climb up higher to maybe get her attention, so you place your feet onto the side of the bandage and prepare to shove off.

As Emily yanks up her panties, you push your legs off the bandage with all your strength. The panties rise up quickly and you manage to get a hand on the waistband but the material bends downwards as you swing into the sidewall of the underwear and the flexible nature of the material proves too difficult to hold onto. You fall backwards with your right hand extended almost in slow motion as you watch the waistband get pulled further up. The light starts to slowly fade as you hit the bottom of the panties and you're sealed inside.

Emily would go on to have dinner and go to bed, all the while unaware that your tiny body was trapped in the..
1313121222222.title: You were close by

choices: Stay in
Go to the park
Something else
13131212222222.content:
Laying in bed, Emily slept peacefully throughout the whole night. She was out cold after such a fun day of painting her toenails that not even the loud noises of her stomach processing last nights dinner or the couple of lazy farts that escaped her butt could wake her. As the first rays of light shone through the window, Emily slowly began to stir. Sitting up slowly, she swivels on her butt to get her feet over the edge of the bed. Standing up, she raises both arms above her head to stretch before rubbing her eyes with her hands. Feeling the need to pee, she starts to shuffle her way to the bathroom, stopping as she enters the restroom, she closes the door and makes her way to the toilet.
Dropping her PJ's and panties down, she gives her butt hole a good scratch to get rid of a small irritation before plopping onto the toilet to relieve her bladder. Ripping off some toilet paper, Emily gives her vagina a thorough wipe before tossing the paper into the bowl and flushing. She skips washing her hands and heads downstairs.

It's Saturday today and both her parents have already left for work. Jake was still in bed but Brianna was awake and already had a bowl of cereal waiting for Emily at the table.

"Good morning Emy" Says Brianna cheerfully.

"Mmm good morning Bri" Emily says back a bit tired still as she sits on the hardwood chair to eat her breakfast.

"What'd you want to do today Emy? We can stay in and watch cartoons or I can take you to the park later."

"Lets..."
13131212222222.title: Back of her panties all night.

choices: When Emily sat down to eat breakfast she pushed you all the way in.
Emily farted you out while watching cartoons.
You were exactly where you were before.
131312122222221.content:
Hitting the inside slope of Emily's panties, the momentum carried your body to the back of her panties. Your observation earlier about the size being to small was correct as the panties created a fierce wedgie which kept you pinned to her inner butt crack. Sighing heavily, she reached for her soda, pausing as she heard a quiet, echoing sound. Where was that coming from? It wasn't a gurgle from the bath, no, it was closer than that, even though it was so quiet. There was a rhythm to it, almost like speech...

Shaking her head, Brianna picked up the soda can. She was probably still buzzed, and once she's released herself she'd stop hearing things. But before the can touched her lips, the same trill of syllables floated up to her. Tilting her ear closer, she realised that it was emanating from within her soda can.

This was freaky. Holding the can at arm's length, she made a snap decision.
1313121222232121133222.title: More Irritation for Brianna

choices: Jenna drinks the soda, not wanting it to go to waste
Jenna pours it out and washes the glass
13131212222321211332222.content:
When the giant teen's brought the soda can up to her head, her ear hovering over the opening like an alien mothership. you allowed hope to enter your heart once more.

"YES! IN HERE! LOOK IN THE CAN!!"

Suddenly everything lurched once more and the ocean of soda you found yourself floating in was quickly transformed into a raging storm. You were quickly pulled under the choppy waves, only getting glimpses of the house whizzing by through the can's opening above. She was clearly on the move, but each of her footsteps was shaking and jarring the soda can so bad you found yourself being thrashed from one end to the other and nearly drowned.

Finally the can hit a hard surface with a mighty thud and the waves subsided. You sputtered and gasped as you managed to paddle up to the surface. You could hear the teen outside opening and closing what sounded like cabinets but you were too busy trying to empty your lungs of soda to think much of it.

Your moment of respite was quickly shattered as the can was suddenly lifted, the gravity sucking you under the surface of the tepid soda yet again and then all hell broke lose. This time instead of a whirlpool you found yourself trapped in a raging rapid current as the soda was pouring out the opening of the can and hammered down into a glass awaiting below.

After another dance with death you managed to barely break the surface of the fizzy drink. You weren't sure how much more of this you could take. You could feel your strength rapidly leaving you and your lungs were burning. Through the glass walls of the cup you could see the full might of the teen girl above. This was your chance!

"H-hey! Down here!!" you tried to scream, but your voice was so worn out by this point. Still, you thrashed and splashed in the soda, trying to alert her to your tiny presence.

Above, the girl's eyes widened, then squinted. Was she trying to make out your form? Against the dark cola you probably seemed like a bug. You could hear her mumble something in disbelief, then began to reach for the can. But before she could bring you closer, a voice pierced the moment.

"BRIANNA! CAN YOU COME HERE FOR A SECOND?" it was the dad, calling from elsewhere in the house.

Brianna sighed in frustration. "YEAH, COMING DAD." and then pounded off. Damn!

You started smacking the surface of the soda screaming and crying. You were so close! Eventually your fit ended and you realized she'd be back soon. Hopefully sooner than later, because paddling in the soda was giving you cramps and you weren't sure how much longer you could do this.

Suddenly approaching footsteps shook the glass. You looked up, hoping to see Brianna returning, but instead the massive form of the mother greeted you instead. She approached the counter with a swift gait. You began your screaming routine once again, but whatever sound you made was quickly drowned out as she turned the sink on and started washing dishes. Dread began to fill your soul.

You started praying Brianna would get back here and continue her investigation, but it didn't seem like it was going to be in the cards as the titanic woman looked at your glass, grumbled something to herself and then reached for it...
13131212222321211332222.title: So Close

choices: The tiny man is not in the glass anymore
The tiny man still float in the soda
131312122223212113322221.content:
Brianna didn't know what to say. In a daze, she reacted automatically to her father's call, padding into the living room while rolling over the possible explanation, passing her mother in the hall.

"You done good, kiddo," he was saying, though she was still too shocked to properly listen to more than about half of what he was saying, nodding at intervals. "Here we thought we'd get back to see the house on fire or something, but you kept Emily in check and got her to bed real quiet. You showed true responsibility, and don;t think we haven't noticed it."

When she realised he was done congratulating her she smiled and thanked him before heading back to the kitchen. With a loud 'clack' her mother placed the soda glass back onto the counter top, a large amount of its contents gone. Wiping the back of her hand against her mouth, the older woman smeared soda and lipstick across her cheek before turning back to the water rolling into the sink.

"Mom!" Brianna gasped, dashing forwards. "What are you doing? That's my soda! And why are you doing the washing up at this time of night?" The teen reached across to turn off the water, then shouted over her shoulder. "Dad! Come and get ahold of mom! I think she's had a bit too much to drink!"

"Nonsense!" her mother laughed, but Brianna was already picking up the half-empty glass of soda and jogging back to her room, hoping she wasn;t too late.
131312122223212113322221.title: Praise and Embarrassment

choices: Brianna is desperately trying to tell her mother what she did
Jenna is complaining to Tim that she drank too much and feels sick....
1313121222232121133222211.content:
You come to suddenly and the first thing you notice is that you can't breathe. You hack and gag and retch, desperate to clear your respiratory tract of fluid. The second thing you notice is that it's pitch black. In your confusion, you wonder if you've somehow gone blind, but before you can ponder that seriously the sheer oppressiveness of the heat and stench around hit you like a sack of bricks. Good god, what is that?!

The sour odor, a combination of alcohol and who-knows-what comes over you so suddenly you're sent into dry heaves. It's only then that you realize you're floating in what feels like a sea of muck, and finally the day's events, including desperately pleading up to the oblivious mother as she lifted you to her lips comes surging back into your mind like a streak of lightning.

The horrible gurgling and groaning... the ever present thump thump... the swaying and rocking.... holy shit you've been swallowed alive!

You start screaming and flailing, but all that does is sink you into the churning mass of masticated food. You break the surface sputtering and burst into tears. This was it. After everything you've gone through, your life was going to come to an end in the stomach of this woman you've never met. All your dreams and aspirations reduced to waste to be unknowingly passed by her in the morning. You sob and start to let yourself sink into the throbbing mess, hoping to end your suffering.

Through the gurgling of Jenna's digestive system you can just hear muffled voices...
1313121222232121133222211.title: A Gut Feeling

choices: The tiny man resigns himself to his fate
The tiny man has a plan of action
13131212222321211332222111.content:
"You think there was a tiny man in that glass," Jenna laughed, "and I drank him. Are you sure you're not the one that's had too much to drink?"

"This is serious, Mom!" Brianna insisted, unable to force the image of the tiny, swimming form from her mind, to un-hear his miniscule screams. Why hadn't she taken the glass with her when she'd gone to see her father? It was all her fault!

"Hey, hey now. Don't go crying, Bri," her mother mumbled, fumbling for a hug. "Tell Mom what the problem is. We can fix it. It isn't so bad."

"Not so bad?!" Brianna forced herself free, spluttering. "He's dead, Mom! You drank him, and it's all... my... fault..."

Jenna sobered a touch at her daughter's breakdown. The story was preposterous, but clearly something had genuinely upset her. What could it be? Should she deal with it herself, or invite Tim in to help?

But as much as she worried, it was as nothing compared to the tiny man in her stomach, wondering how to spend the last minutes of his life...
13131212222321211332222111.title: A Matter of Life and Digestion

choices: You awaken to Brianna's sight
You sink into the soda
1313121222232121133222212.content:
The woman's hand reaches down, fingers and thumb squeezing against the glass. That largest of digits presses hard, its towering, whorled surface paling as it impacts just the thickness of the glass from where you float. You dread to think what a mess it would make of you were it to rub against you directly.

She lifts the glass with no effort, and the whirling madness of this soda ocean returns. Yet she lifts you far higher than the teen ever did, and for the second time this day you are in awe of her mountainous breasts. One glimpse of Heaven, before you're sent to Hell?

Her chin passes in less than a second, and her mouth settles into view above you. There is a flash of horror as her lumpen tongue flickers out to moisten her lips before they part fully, an exhalation of alcoholic breath washing out over you. The glass tilts, but you remain level, paddling to keep yourself away from the infinite darkness of that throat, beyond those hanging teeth and lolling tongue.

The woman tilts her head back, your glass prison matching its angle. The draining commences, gallons of liquid sucked down by gravity, the echoing boom of its doomed fate reverberating from the throat. It easily makes your screams silent, as you struggle to keep your place as far from her as possible, to make yourself the last drop into that abyss.

Without warning the glass returns to the counter, with the largest quake yet, and you swirl in the eddies it spins up. You survived! But even as you laugh in shock and relief, you look upwards to see the top of glass an impossible distance above you; you'll never be able to climb that, and soon this giant woman will want to take a second drink...

The, the thunder of shouting, and the teenager returns! She and her mother trade words, but you can't make out a word of it. The girl reaches for the glass, and you're lifted and flailing as she runs with it held close to her chest. This is more than you can take, and finally your brain shuts down from the sickness, the lapping soda eager to claim your unconscious form...
1313121222232121133222212.title: Staring Death in the Mouth

choices: Jenna has followed her daughter to see what's wrong
The tiny man gets aboard the toothbrush
13131212222321211332222121.content:
Back in her room, Brianna gingerly brought the glass up to her eye, peering down at its lowered level of soda. Yes! There he was! Just a speck, but the little arms, paddling away to keep him afloat, were clear. There was a tiny man - or woman, she realised, as it was too small to see any details - in her glass of soda. She put her free hand to her mouth to cover her gasp, then removed it as she moved her mouth to the glass.

"Sorry about Mom," she whispered. "I think she and Dad were celebrating tonight. Oh, um, my name is Brianna, and I'll get you out of there soon."

But how to do that? She couldn't reach her hand in to grab the little guy, and she didn't want to pour the glass out for fear of drowning him... She snapped her fingers. Eureka! Keeping the glass with her, she walked swiftly to the bathroom, and picked up her toothbrush. Plenty of bristles on that, lots of chances for the tiny person to grip onto, and then she could just pull him free.

"Get ready," she whispered, holding the brush above the glass.
13131212222321211332222121.title: A Tiny Man At Her Mercy

choices: Brianna shows you to her younger sister
Brianna pretends to be brushing her teeth
131312122223212113322221212.content:
"Brianna." The word that you wake to, the name of the delivering goddess above you, and what you're going to - when you get out of this absurd situation - name your first-born. He may not like it much, but if he knew the shit you'd been through today...

A bizarre object descends into your prison, and as you paddle in the cola you look up to see the array of spiky white and blue protuberances offered. they get closer and closer, a cluster of huddled, inverted pylons, pausing just shy of your face.

Ripping one hand free of your sticky restraint, you seek to grab on with your fingers. The slickness of the cola clinging to you means that it takes a while, and in the end you scrape it dry on one spike before grabbing onto another. The thick, powerful bristle seems more than capable of supporting your weight, and you repeat the process with the other hand. Any effort to pull your lower body free, dragging yourself out with your miniscule upper strength, proves futile.

In the end, it isn't much better than treading cola. How are you to let Benign Brianna know that you-re ready for her to -

Whoa! Suddenly there is no drag on your legs from the goop, as they fly free into thin air, a sudden rush of acceleration ripping you free in a moment. You tighten your grip on the toothbrush as the glass suddenly becomes a memory, so far below you, seeming a trivial thing where once it was your world.

Ripping your eyes away, you look straight ahead to see Bounteous Brianna's face revealed, an impossibly huge visage before which you hang. Her mighty mouth is rippling between smiling and gasping, her eyes focused on you.

Then her eyes snap upward, looking past you, and a horribly familiar voice rumbles through the air. "What'cha doin', Bri?" Damnit! Having carried you around on her foot, squeezed you between her fingers, it seems like Emily isn't done getting in your way yet! How will the older girl deal with this newcomer?
131312122223212113322221212.title: Recognition

choices: She spots it.
It's gone! He must've gotten lost in her mouth.
1313121222232121133222212122.content:
Brianna grinned as she watched the tiny figure cling to the bristles of her toothbrush. She felt kind of heroic, having rescued the speck of a being from her soda. She brought the brush to her face, astonished by its enormity compared to the person she'd just saved. She was about to tip him into her palm when someone entered the bathroom.

"What'cha doin', Bri?" She jumped at the sound of her little sister's voice. Brianna had been so focused on her little discovery, she'd forgotten to lock the door. In a split-second decision to hide it, she eased the toothbrush into her mouth as Emily peeked in.

"Nothing, Emily." The older sister mumbled, trying to look natural. She rested the bristles on her tongue. She shooed away the smaller girl with her free hand, fighting the instinctive urge to swallow the saliva building in her mouth. "You can brush your teeth in a sec."

Brianna's shoulders fell in relief as the little girl bought her act, stepping outside. The teen shut the door before hastily pulling the toothbrush from her mouth.

"Sorry!" She whispered, searching for the a minute form amongst the bristles...
1313121222232121133222212122.title: Nothing to See Here!

choices: Brianna tries to communicate with the tiny man
Tiny man rescued, Brianna waits for morning to talk
Brianna takes the tiny man to show her parents
13131212222321211332222121221.content:
Saved! You can look up at the gigantic face of your saviour and smile, knowing that the beginning of the end of the nightmare is upon you. Your arms are getting tired from clinging to the toothbrush bristle, but as you look don you can see a vast plain of skin, the girl clearly about to allow you to drop into her palm.

In a moment, your relief is replaced with panic, the world whirling away, the calm bathroom environment replaced by the looming darkness of an opening mouth, which crashes down to seal your escape all too quickly. You narrowly escaped being devoured by the woman, and now her daughter's going to get you? There's no justice!

Damp, warm flesh presses against your back, soaking your clothes through. In total darkness, the tongue is all you know until your ears are suddenly smashed by the sounds of the girl talking. The powerful waves of her voice deafen you, the exhalation almost ripping into you with enough force to make you lose your grip on the toothbrush.

Almost. You've come so far, being stuck to nails, soaked in baths, crushed by thighs and dunked in coke. This is nothing compared to that.

So you're still clinging on tight once the girl releases you from the depths of her mouth, and you can see the dry harbour of her palm below you: an expansive tract of young skin, criss-crossed by deep grooves. It comes in close enough for you to drop off, landing fairly softly. Intense heat rises from the land, the air still thick with the scent of soap. Fingers curl upward at the periphery of your vision, each greater in size than a skyscraper, but moving with practised ease.

Above, the face of God. Only, it's just a teenage girl looking down at you, a speck on her hand. How much can she hear when you speak? Is she Horton-like, the only one aware of your tiny danger? What will she do now?
13131212222321211332222121221.title: She spots it.

choices: Brianna just puts the tiny man on her bedside table
Brianna drops the tiny man into a drawer
Brianna locks the tiny man in a box
131312122223212113322221212211.content:
Folding her legs beneath her, Brianna took a closer look at the tiny man by the light of her bedside lamp. So, so small! Each crease and fold in her young palm was an obstacle to him, and her thumb's width alone was an impassable wall! Where had he come from? Why was he in her drink? What should she say to him?

After a moment, she whispered to him as quietly as she could: "Sorry about putting you in my mouth, but I didn't want Emily -"

She stopped talking once she actually looked down, seeing that even her quietest exhalations blasted the tiny man across her skin, tumbling head over heels uncontrollably. Instinctively, she cupped her hand so he wouldn't drop off it, and he bounced from the lower part of her index finger.

Another 'sorry' almost escaped her lips before she bit her tongue for fear of making things worse. Luckily, he was picking himself up, but talking seemed to be out of the question. So how could the two of them communicate? She didn't have a pencil in her room, and even if she had one, how could she expect a man that could be crushed beneath a shaving to write anything?

Heck, she was too tired to think this through right now. A good night's rest, and she could think on it in the morning. She'd just have to give the little fella somewhere to sleep safely...
131312122223212113322221212211.title: Just the Two of You

choices: Climb the laptop
Catch some sleep
Go exploring
1313121222232121133222212122111.content:
The hand you stand on smashes down onto a surface with crushing force, although to the girl carrying you it was probably not even noticeable. She thankfully remains silent as her fingers uncurl, and you take the initiative to realise that she wants you to climb down.

Her thick skin is as unrelenting as a rockface, and just as pitted with marks and indentations. It's easy enough to descend to the surface of her desk, and then you are bowled off your feet by the backwash of her withdrawing arm.

Sprawled, you look up at her immensity as she looks right back down at you. A crack of doom and the light turns off, your only illumination what sliver of moon sneers through the window. There are thuds as she steps away from you, and another storm washes over you as she pulls her bedsheets over herself, leaving you alone.

In near-total dark, you give considerable attention to the monoliths around you. There's very little to go on, but you soon realise that it is not the moon shining down on you: no, that vast rectangle of light is the screensaver from the girl's laptop above you and bigger than the largest cinema screen in existence.

The sheer surface of the computer's keyboard is a harder climb than Brianna's hand, but if you apply yourself with ferocity you should be able to get to the top, maybe see if you can type a message?

Is it really worth the effort, though? Maybe you should just catch some sleep like Brianna is doing - it has been quite the tiring day, what with the feet, the baths, the thighs, the cola and everything. You'd be forgiven for collapsing right now!

If neither of those appeals to you, maybe you could see what else you can look at in this epic room...
1313121222232121133222212122111.title: Quest to Communicate

choices: The father, Tim
The mother, Jenna
The brother, Jake
13131212222321211332222121221111.content:
With a yawn and a rapid blinking, Brianna took only a moment to remember her tiny guest. Nearly springing from her bed, she looked over her desk for any sign of him. Ah, there he was, on the keyboard of her laptop!

Squatting down, she realised all over again just how tony he was, barely the size of the comma symbol. Had he climbed up there to try and type a message? There was surely no way he'd have enough strength to press down a key, as evidenced by the still glowing screensaver.

Stifling a giggle, she allowed a breath to slip out, even that minor exhalation pushing the dude across where he lay. He began to move, woken from his slumber.

As he stirred, she already reached to her bedside table to retrieve an item before bringing it down toward him. It was something she'd pondered before she finally dropped off to sleep, a way to touch him and communicate without too much danger. She nearly laughed again as she wondered what he must be thinking as he awoke to the sight of a giant cotton swab before him.

He seemed to catch on quick, this guy, and he grabbed the clean white tip with both hands. Brianna picked him up and brought the end around to her ear, careful not to crush the man against her face. Feeling the barest tickle as he stepped into her ear, she put the swab down and began to get dressed. He couldn't peep on her from in there, after all.

"So, now I should be able to talk without you being deafened, right?" she said.

"Seems that way," he replied.

"And I can hear you too: cool! So, how did you get that way?"

"I don't know. I just want it undone, I just want to go home!"

Clothed, Brianna sank into her desk chair, tapping her laptop into life. "Where is it you live? I'll see how close we are."

The words he whispered into her ear - though he may have been bellowing at the top of his lungs, for all she knew - made no sense. They were gibberish, no places she's ever heard of. "What country are those in? What continent?"

More nonsense, and at her clueless grunt he gave an exasperated groan of his own. "I couldn't be more clear, here! I'm speaking plain English!"

"English? Is that a language? Wait..." Brianna pushed herself back from the desk edge, bringing her hands to her mouth. "What if... What if you haven't been shrunk? What if you're an alien, and you're just naturally this tiny?"

"That can't be right! What I've seen of this place seems so familiar! What are the chances there'd be another planet that's pretty similar, just at a different scale?"

"What are the chances you'd get shrunk so small? I say we give up on finding a place that doesn't exist on this planet, and try to find the spaceship that brought you here! Where do you first remember coming here?"

"I was on your doormat, just before you and your family came downstairs for breakfast. Then your sister -"

"Yeah, uh, I don;t need the details of what happened then. I imagine it's pretty gross. Pretty much anything Emily ever does is pretty gross, so I can only imagine how much worse it must be at your scale." She span in her chair, legs drawn up under her chin. "So, I think one of us must have brought you in with them when they came home. I wonder who it was? Who do you think I should ask about it?"
13131212222321211332222121221111.title: Morning of Mystery

choices: Brianna sticks close to Tim, to see where he goes
Brianna heads off on her own to see what the business does
Brianna takes you out to explore on your own
131312122223212113322221212211111.content:
Brianna's ear is getting more and more comfortable. She naturally keeps it very level, and there's no chance of anything smashing you. There's a warmth here, and the gentle brush of minute hairs. With only a tunnel of light, it's like a spooky cave, but one through which the voice of a god reverberates. The sounds of the macro world are fainter than Brianna's voice, and you are more in awe of her power than ever before.

As she asks your opinion on where to start the search, you roll over it in your kind, while at the same time coming to terms with her theory. What is this, Land of the Gaints? Is that really the most reasonable, Occam-approved explanation for your predicament?

Well, let's say that it is. Who should your benefactor talk to about it? Obviously, not her asshole brother, and probably not the drunken mother that almost drank you last night. The father?

She nods her head at your suggestion, and you cling to a thick clump of hairs for balance as the titan goes on her way. The world rocks as she walks, but you sit in a comfortable, skin-covered hammock of safety. The pounding of her steps is a distant echo, soon interrupted by her words as she greets her father on this undoubtedly fine morning.

"How's work been, Dad?" she asks subtly.

"Same old, same old," he mutters. "You wouldn't believe what they've got us doing there."

"Yeah, about that - do you think I could tag along and see you at work today? I mean, you offered a few weeks ago, and I know I said no at the time, but now..."

"Do my ears deceive me? You're gong to give up a Saturday to spend the day with your dear old dad in his dreary old office?"

"You said I was getting very responsible last night, and I thought about it, and decided I'd take that responsibility a step further! That, and my only other choice would be to spend the day with Jake..."

"Heh, I understand. Well, get your shoes on quick, because I'm already a little late!"

Brianna whispers to you. "Must be you got on his shoe while he was at work, and he brought you back with him. We go in the other direction, we'll find where you came from!"

Makes sense. "Makes sense," you say. "Just - be careful! Don't want you to get shrunk too!"

"I won't - remember, you're a tiny alien, not a shrunken person!"

"Says you - you've read too much Gulliver's Travels."

"Who's what?"

"Come again?" asks her father, and she shrugs off his question. "Let's go, Dad!"

You zone out of the banal familial conversation during the drive to work, and wonder what approach Brianna will take to her investigations. There will be danger here, you're sure of it, and you don't want her taking too many risks...
131312122223212113322221212211111.title: Bring Your Daughter to Work

choices: The scientists return and surprise Brianna
Some tiny earthlings come through the portal
Brianna is sucked through the portal to Earth
1313121222232121133222212122111112.content:
"Well, this is where the magic happens," Tim smiled, gesturing around his pokey little office.

Brianna raised an eyebrow as she took it all in: the cluttered desk with its stacks of papers, the timetables and safety notices pinned on the wall...

"Nice," she said. "Uh, which way is the little girls' room? I know I should've gone before we left, but..."

Tim smiled and pointed out of the doorway. Nodding and blushing, Brianna dashed out of his sight and ducked into another corridor. "Let's see what they're hiding here, little dude..." she whispered.

"What does your father actually do for a living?" the voice in her head asked.

"Oh, he just counts beans, or something - clerical work. He doesn't work on the actual business."

"Which is..?"

Brianna pushed open a door into the laboratory, where rows upon rows of benches and banks of computers fanned out from a central, glowing device.

"Energy research, he calls it," she said, before ducking for cover as a brace of be-lab-coated scientists strode into view, scratching away at clipboards and tablets.

"The portal's output is down twelve percent from yesterday," one snarled, "ans I guess it will fall even further in the days to come."

"Then we must stabilise it, or else pull the source through to this side."

"You have any idea how much space it would take up?"

"We'll find room."

"Well, that can wait until I've been to the little girls' room..."

There was a crunch, and the scientist looked down at her foot. "Another one. Oh well, they really should know better..."

Once the pair had left, Brianna popped out to look at what had been stepped on. A shattered, yet recognisably humanoid form...

Gasping, she strode closer to the room's centre, gazing through a porthole into the portal...

There was a globe, of blue and green, distant but reachable, continental patterns completely unfamiliar.

"Uh, could you describe what your planet looks like, dude?"

"You're shitting me. Planet Earth is being used as some sort of {i]Men in Black power source by other-dimensional giants?"

Brianna didn't get the reference, but that wasn't what caught her attention "Your planet is called Earth? Dude, your people suck at naming things."
1313121222232121133222212122111112.title: Ultimate Cosmic Power

choices: ...sitting on the tongue.
...wedged in between two lower front teeth
...desperately clinging on at the very edge of the throat
13131212222321211332222121222.content:
Saved! You can look up at the gigantic face of your saviour and smile, knowing that the beginning of the end of the nightmare is upon you. Your arms are getting tired from clinging to the toothbrush bristle, but as you look don you can see a vast plain of skin, the girl clearly about to allow you to drop into her palm.

In a moment, your relief is replaced with panic, the world whirling away, the calm bathroom environment replaced by the looming darkness of an opening mouth, which crashes down to seal your escape all too quickly. You narrowly escaped being devoured by the woman, and now her daughter's going to get you? There's no justice!

Damp, warm flesh presses against your back, soaking your clothes through. In total darkness, the tongue is all you know until your ears are suddenly smashed by the sounds of the girl talking. The powerful waves of her voice deafen you, the exhalation also ripping into you with enough force to make you lose your grip on the toothbrush.

Without sight, without sound, buffeted by the waves of breath and undulations of the tongue, it's no wonder that you're not on the brush when it leaves the mouth, but instead...
13131212222321211332222121222.title: Lost In The Dark

choices: Brianna finishes.
Brianna is interrupted.
13131212222321212.content:
It says tactical decision. If you wanted to survive you had to get her attention, and to do that you'd need to climb her. You couldn't scale her knees, which looked more like mountains than legs as they rose from water, so realistically you had to take the middle route.

At least, that's what you told yourself as you floated just mere yards above the her giant pink gash.

It was kinda like swimming in the deep end of a public pool, except instead of a concrete floor there was a teenage girl's labia.

Your thoughts are swatted away the same as your body as her fingers flick you off her leg. You scream bloody murder as you fall through open air, spiraling over and over. Glancing down, your eyes widen as the mouth of her red high heeled pump greets you. Then, a harsh thud.

You struggle to knock the dizziness from your head as you lay on the insole of her shoe. Wearily looking up, you see the woman pointing her nylon-clad foot right in your direction before lowering it into your new prison. You whimper as her mammoth toes close in, and all goes dark.
13133.title: From Man to Lint

choices: You remained with Jenna
You fell down among the protesters
131331.content:
Jenna pulled into her parking spot on campus after dropping Emily off at school. It wasn't a big college where she worked, but it was enough.

Her walk to her office was blocked, however, by some eco group holding picket signs outside of the biology labs. Jenna was already running late and there was no time to reroute... She sigh, and walked through them.

"Excuse me Ma'am!"

Damn it. "I'm sorry, I'm really running late." A young woman with unwashed, braided hair came up to her.

"Oh, this will only be a moment of your time. You see, the labs here are doing experiments on animals that are cruel and blah blah blah"

Jenna stopped listening. Impatiently, she wiggled her toes. For a second, she thought she felt something in her shoe, but the sensation disappeared too quickly to be sure. She pulled her foot slowly from the shoe, shaking it lightly in the cool breeze.

"...so, would you be willing to sign this petition?"

"Not right now. I am really going to be late, but if you're all still here when the day is through, I be sure to sign it." No, if you're all still here I walk a different route.

"All right! Thank you for your support on this important issue."

Jenna walked off, perhaps a bit faster than strictly necessary. She got to her office soon enough.

"Hippies," she muttered with a sigh.
131331.title: Just a moment of your time

choices: Jenna is a fierce shoeplayer, and you're along for the ride
Jenna's heels are too tight, she goes without them
1313311.content:
You're not entirely sure how you're still alive, but you are. Things are dark down in this woman's pump and you find yourself squeezed tightly between two firm unyielding masses. You have no way to tell, but you're lodged between the second and third toe of this woman, reduced from a man to some lint caught in her stocking. Her footsteps were incredibly jarring, lifting you through the air and slamming you into the ground rapidly over and over at incredible speed. There was a length of time where the footsteps stopped and were replaced with vibrations. During that time you could vaguely hear some of the giant sounds from outside. But it wasn't long before the woman started walking again. The disorienting movements combined with the warmth from her body and the oppressive scent of her bodywash cause you to puke up the contents of your stomach.

Then, the walking stopped. You had no idea what was going on, but you could hear some muffled voices up above and street sounds. Where was this woman?

Before you can think on it any more, the walls entrapping you suddenly clamped hard on your tiny body, grinding you between them and causing you to yelp in pain. You were dragged harshly up against the pattern that makes up her stockings (more like a soft chain link fence to your size) and gasped as you could feel one of the frayed pieces of material wrap around your torso. The squeezing relented, but then you felt everything lurch as she pulled her foot from the shoe!

"...so would you be willing to sign this petition?" you hear a voice booming from above.

"Help! Down here! Anyone!" you scream. The sudden burst of light was disorienting, but you can see exactly where you were. Between this lady's toes caught in her stockings like a bug! Up above, the giantesses pay no attention to your desperate pleas. To add insult to injury, she even shakes her foot in the air, making you even more nauseous.

"Not right now. I am really going to be late, but iffinfifnigg" is all you hear from the woman's response before she shoves her foot and you back into darkness. The walking resumes.

At the office...
1313311.title: Between Her Toes

choices: Naomi,  Jenna's Star Student
Jonah, Troublesome Punk
13133111.content:
Jenna walked into her work office. It was a rather simple room but worked well enough for her needs. It was small and white with a back wall covered with many books: Novels, textbooks, notebooks packed to the brim with notes. As the middle aged woman sat on her chair, she let out a sigh of relief. These heels were killing her!

She booted up her desktop pc, ready to begin work for the day. As she did so, she crossed her legs letting the shoe on the hovering leg dangle furiously off the edge of her nylon-clad toes. Occasionally, she got the feeling that something was bouncing off the tops of her toes. A bug? A rock? She didn't know and she didn't care to find out. She had to focus on this lesson plan.

*KNOCK KNOCK*

"Come in!" Jenna called out as the shoe finally fell off of her foot. "

"Ah!" She continued as a person she totally forgot she was expecting that morning walked in.
13133111.title: In the Office

choices: You are in the heel still, alone
You are in the flat now, with her
13133112.content:
Comfortably at her desk, Jenna took a moment to relax. She pulled her feet from her shoes, stretching her toes and lazily watching lint drift from them into her heels. She really needed to stop by the store and pick up a new pair. These were a sweet gift from Tim, but he was terrible at getting the size right. Maybe she'd do that after work.

She got to work, firing up her computer. Her job wasn't the glamorous life of a professor, but it was never the less important. As the head admissions counselor, she helped high school hopefuls get into the college, and when the time came, she review their applications. That time had come, and she was up for another long day of reading cookie cutter personal statements.

Consciously, she looked over the applications and marked them for points. Subconsciously, she played with her feet. They were active as wild animals, swinging freely from her ankle with minds of their own. Her toes, too, had their crazy side, grabbing roughly at the chair, the floor, the desk, her shoes, anything that they could reach.

At around ten, there was a knock at her door. "Mrs. Stevenson?"

Her feet stilled. "Yes?"

"A high school is here for the tour."

That was right, she'd had this on her calendar. "Give me just a moment."

She instinctively began to slip her feet into the heels. Her toes were halfway down the insole when she remembered just how uncomfortable they were. She pried open a desk drawer. "No... No... Nope... Ah! Here they are." From the draw she yanked out a pair of flats. Much more sensible for the walk through campus.

"Alright," she called out to the group of students as she found them outside of the building. "Who wants to know more about our prestigious institution?"
13133112.title: All work and no play

choices: You make it out of the shoe
She's back before you finish
131331121.content:
At first, shrinking had been kinda impressive. Hell, it'd been outright cool. You were a secret spy, beyond the notice of the ordinary, able to view the world at a angle no one else could.

That had been replaced fully with fear and nausea.

When she had first pulled free from the heels, you'd hoped to have be among the lucky pieces of lint that floated peacefully away from the feet. You almost were too, as most of your body came free from the damp nylons while she stretched her toes. But to your unending anger and frustration, your torso was firmly caught, tangled among the stretchy fabric to the point of immobility.

Her feet settled on the ground, you mostly unmolested under the toes. The peace was short lived, as soon enough everything south of the ankle began working at full cylinders. The motion was never the same for long, constantly shifting and constantly driving you insane. At one moment it was all footwork, swinging you back and forth as the foot bobbed or shook. At other times the toes seemed alive, stretching and squeezing you as if you were nothing more than a part of her pantyhose. Sometimes, it was both at once, churning your world much like a blender.

The worst parts were when she started to get grabby. As her toes wrapped around everything in proximity, from her chair to the carpet, you were granted the great pleasure to meet all sorts of hard, rough, or otherwise unwashed surfaces.

You almost missed the knock at the distant door. "Mrs. Stevenson?" the voice called out. Finally, a name for your torturer.

Her feet went still as answer. "Yes?"

"A high school is here for the tour." High school? Tour? Where did this mystery behemoth work?

A pause, then, "Give me a moment." Her feet, your prison, lifted. You watched in horror as the pale interior of the heel stared up at you. She started to put her foot in, her sole dragging you along the smooth insole. You're about to scream again, but the foot stops short. It begins to reverse, yanking you back up the slope. This time, though, you feel a snag. It may have been a bit of bunched up insole, some misplaced static cling, or divine intervention, but with a snap the nylon holding you in place breaks. You tumble down the shoe as the toes wiggle up above, a sort of stinky goodbye.

You sit in the deepest part of the pump, listening to her mutter to herself. A thump, the sound of her feet slipping into some other godforsaken pair of shoes, then she stomped away, into the great unknown.

What a relief.

She'll be back though, and who knows when you'll get another chance like this. You peer up the mountainous slope of the heel, the fluorescent lights from high above shining in. Time to get climbing.
131331121.title: Dangling

choices: knocked into Cynthia's line of fire earlier
knocked into one of Jenna's flats
1313311212.content:
Jenna walked back into her office, grateful to be able to sink into her chair. Giving tours were a double-edged sword; they helped kill a sizable amount of the morning but it was also exhausting maintaining the enthusiasm at times. She pulled the flats off her feet and dropped them to the floor. Crossing one leg over the other, she sighed as she gave her feet a little massage.

The last of the morning went by quietly. Jenna was anxious for lunch, she was meeting her friend Cynthia and couldn't wait to get out of the office. While working, she absent mindedly knocked both pairs of her shoes about with her feet-- grasping her flats and flopping them about before pawing at her heels. At one point she half-slipped on both her heels and dragged them beneath her chair, crossing her feet at the ankles. The shoe suspended in the air dropped off and tumbled a bit further under her chair, but she paid it no mind as she typed. Not much more time passed before Cynthia appeared in her doorway.

"Hey!"

Jenna was surprised, she thought she'd be meeting Cynthia, not the other way around.

"What are you doing here?" Jenna asked.

"It's a half-day today, remember?" Cynthia replied. She was a middle school teacher, and Jenna kind of envied how casual she was allowed to dress as she admired her simple blouse, jeans and black flip-flops.

Cynthia walked into the office and laughed, seeing Jenna's two pairs of shoes scattered about on the floor.

"What's going on here?"

"Oh..." Jenna replied, just now noticing, "I'm.. not sure" she laughed. "But I do need new heels. These ones Tim bought me are cut but they're just so tight!"

"Well maybe if there's time we can go shopping after lunch," Cynthia said.

As the two women gabbed up above, unaware of your presence you were...
1313311212.title: Lunch Time

choices: You land on the right foot
You land elsewhere in the office
13133112121.content:
Good news: You weren't stuck to Mrs. Stevenson's feet anymore.

Bad news: Once she began playing with her shoes, you went flying.

Your lack of size still managed to surprise you, as just a few moments into the resumed shoe play, your tiny little body was sent soaring across the room. She wasn't even trying, and she managed to score a home run with you.

The carpet in front of the door rushed up to meet you, but it wasn't a whole lot of help. It was the cheap stuff, a thin layer of fabric compacted tightly together. It hurt when you hit it.

And so you lay there, small as a speck and smelling like sweat, staring up at the sky-high ceiling. How did life ever go so wrong?

"Hey!" Ah shit, you'd taken too much time. A pair of massive black flip-flops, filled by an equally massive woman, were walking through the door.

"What are you doing here?" asked the other one. What indeed, as the foam shoes came closer. You flinched and prepared for the worst.

"It's a half-day today, remember?" The booming steps stopped. Risking a glance up, you she she'd stopped right on you; her left foot to your right, and her right to your left.

The tower above laughed. "What's going on here?" Amused, her left foot tapped, blowing a gust of wind towards you. You gripped the carpet, desperate to not be blown away.

"Oh..." replied Mrs. Stevenson. "I'm.. not sure." She laughed. "But I do need new heels. These ones Tim bought me are cute but they're just so tight!" You had to agree with her on that.

The left foot by you tapped again. This must have been a much funnier joke, since this time you were powerless against the bellows of wind she displaced. You went flying again.

"Well maybe if there's time we can go shopping after lunch."
13133112121.title: Line of fire

choices: Take Cynthia's car to the diner
Just walk to the nearby Wendy's
131331121211.content:
The clouds in the sky had retreated, and the two women walked under the perfect blue.

For a bit, they simply walked, enjoying the peaceful day. A rumbling from Jenna's insides changed that. "So, where did you have in mind?"

Cynthia shrugged. "No where in particular. I'm not in this part of town very often. Something more laid back would be my kind of place."

"I don't know if anything around here really qualifies." Jenna laughed. "Well, there is a Wendy's down the street, but most of the sit-in places in walking distance are either very fancy, or targeted for a poor college student."

"Do we have to eat around here? I know of a good diner by where I work."

"That could work, but we'll have to take your car."

Cynthia grimaced. "What's wrong with your's? Mine's a bit messy from various school projects I've been trying. Papers everywhere, you know?"

Jenna grimaced too. "The staff parking lot is surrounded by protesting college students. Something about trade agreements or some other hippie nonsense. I'm not going back through that."

The two stopped for a moment, and together decided to...
131331121211.title: What to eat, what to eat...

choices: Jenna begins absentmindedly playing with Cynthia's flip-flop
Cynthia slips her flip-flops back on
1313311212112.content:
You never thought you'd miss being trapped inside a shoe, but compared to your current predicament this was downright terrifying. You were blown on top of this giant woman's right foot from nothing but her idle tapping and when she and the your other captor walked from the office you were struggling to maintain grip on the mass of flesh, terrified of being blown away into the unknown.

Each of the woman's footsteps shook the earth violently, thrashing you and sending you rolling across the plain of her foot. You were knocked into and over the tree root-like veins across the top of her foot, forced to quickly grab onto her flesh as the foot would once again rise. The sound of her flip-flop slapping against the sole of her foot was comparable to that of a thunderclap to your ears, forcing you to constantly wince. With all that combined with the booming sound of the woman's idle chit-chat above, and the harsh sun beating down onto you, you were wondering how long you'd be able to maintain your sanity.

Part of you wanted to just let go and fall somewhere, but being stuck outside was surely an even worse death sentence. You'd probably get plucked up by a bird or something.

The footsteps stopped harshly, and you were jarred from the top of the woman's foot shrieking and bouncing along the surface down towards her toes. You slid down the slightly sloped surface until you slammed into the column-like part of the sandal that separated her big toe from the others.You could hear the women booming above, but couldn't really make out the words. Something about... hippies? Then Wendys? Suddenly everything began to move again.

With no warning you found yourself squeezed harshly in the web of flesh between the woman's toes and the toe separator of the flip flop. You pressed up against the column as the slightly sticky flesh hugged you, still afraid of being torn away or even squashed at this point.

After another agonizing round of walking the lighting suddenly changed and you were met with blessed air conditioning. (Thought at your size it was almost freezing). Some extended time of standing gave you a chance to climb out from your alcove and see your surroundings-- the other woman whose morning you spent as her toe lint was still here, and you could see you were in a Wendys, now turned into an endless universe sprawling before you. The women were waiting in line for food and your attempts to call out to them were drowned out by the cacophony of sounds around you. Your prison suddenly lurched again as the two friends made their way to a table.

Seeing everything zoom by so quickly was making you incredibly dizzy and nauseous and before you could even get your bearings everything stopped yet again and the foot you were on suddenly vanished from under you, causing you to fall onto a black, sticky surface.

Your head was throbbing as you looked above you. The woman's bare feet loomed ahead in the air, her toes stretching and spreading before she tucked them beneath her chair. It took you a second to realize she slipped her flip-flop off and that you fell to its surface. You grimaced as you could see dust and debris litter the surface, realizing you were not much bigger than the dirt on a sandal. Turning around, you were treated to a sight of the woman whose name you believed to be Mrs. Stevenson's massive nylon feet slipping out of a pair of flats. Your eyes widened as her legs suddenly stretched forward, her feet barreling right towards you and the empty sandals.

She stopped right before you, crossing her feet at the ankles. Her soles loomed above you, almost threateningly. As the women talked and ate above, their voices sounding like distant thunder, she thoughtlessly scrunched her toes at you. You watched as they came into contact with "your" woman's flip-flop's straps, lightly stroking them. She didn't even realize what she was doing. You shuddered wondering just what it would take to get these behemoths' attention.

You needed to think of something fast, but you didn't get much of a chance as...
1313311212112.title: Surrounded by Feet

choices: You are in Jenna's purse
You are on Jenna's nylon
13133112121121.content:
"Number 52! Frosty, two cheeseburgers, large fries and a small drink?"

Jenna looked up from the pictures she was showing her friend. "Oh, I think that's ours."

Spinning her chair, Cynthia stood. "I'll get 'em," she said.

Watching her long time friend stroll barefooted up to the counter, Jenna smiled. It had been too long since they'd had a chance to just sit and chat. She looked at the picture of her family she had on her phone. Jake had been, what, 13, when Cynthia got married? Life had been so hectic since then, just go go go without anytime to rest. There was always something that had to be done, always a source of stress to be quashed.

Jenna absentmindedly grabbed at her friend's flip-flops with her toes, pulling both of them towards her. She pressed her foot onto the foam, feeling the gritty surface through her nylon. As Cynthia returned and the two friends began to talk again, Jenna kept playing with the purloined shoe, tapping her foot over it and grinding her toes into the worn material. It was a subconscious distraction, keeping her thoughts focused on fun and away from any more depressing thoughts.

"I need to stop at the ladies room," Cynthia said after the two had finished their meals. "Don't you leave without me!"

"I wouldn't think of it," Jenna replied. Reaching down for her flats, she was surprised to notice that she'd completely slipped on the flip-flops during the meal. They were good, her tired soles feeling comforted by the soft, worm foam. She pulled her feet free, and grimaced as she saw the layer of grime that was stuck to the bottom of her nylons. "Does Cynthia really wear shoes this dirty?" she asked herself.

With a sigh, she grabbed a napkin and began to wipe her soles clean. Clods of dirt and shedded hairs and the corpses of bugs cascaded off her sole and onto the paper, where they were bunched up in tight fist. She dropped the balled up napkin in her purse, another chore to be dealt with late, and after kicking the flip-flops back towards Cynthia's side she slipped her feet into her own flats.

Cynthia returned, grabbed her shoes, and with a smile asked, "Ready to head on back?"

Jenna smiled too, and simply nodded.
13133112121121.title: The shoe's on the other foot

choices: You eventually get jarred free from the napkin
You're unable to free yourself....
131331121211211.content:
You weren't entirely sure what had happened. One second you were on one of the giant women's sandals, then next thing you know you were crushed beneath a foot, soared high into the air, and now compacted into a ball of napkin and dunked into darkness.

At first you were afraid you had been chucked into a waste bin-- destined to be thoughtless buried underneath trash. But your prison sways and hurls through the air, rocking you back and forth violently. You can still make out the voices of the women from earlier, albeit totally muffled, but still, you were with them. Perhaps shoved into a pocket or something. No... it seemed roomier than that.

Your prison lurches and shudders, and the loud jangling of keys finally makes you realize you've been stuffed into this woman's purse. You grunt and scream trying to remove yourself from the bunched up napkin, but you're basically encased from all sides. Each time the purse rocks, the items within move and crash about causing you to yelp from fear of being crushed.

Your only consolation is that you're primed in a much better position to get this woman's attention than ever. She'll have to eventually look into her purse. Mrs. Stevenson... you remember hearing her name earlier when you were being mauled by her foot. If you can just free yourself from this balled-up napkin, you can perhaps position yourself to be in plain sight when she hopefully opens her purse next...
131331121211211.title: Purse Prison

choices: You're still stuck in the flattened napkin
You're stuck to one of the girls' feet
1313311212112112.content:
Jenna brushed the napkin aside as she dug through her purse for the keys. "4:30," she muttered to herself as she entered her house. "Still plenty of time before our date." She smiled; that morning she'd ridiculed Jake for being excited for a similar thing. Oh well. She and Tim deserved a night out, even if it was something simple.

Distracted, she set her purse on the corner of the coffee table, letting it fall to the floor. Luckily, its contents remained inside and didn't spill all over. That is, except for the balled up napkin, which bounced over by the staircase. Jenna sighed, and moved to grab it.

"Hey Mom!" young Emily said, bounding around the corner. Jenna held back a grimace as her daughter's foot flattened the napkin, recalling the gross mess it had wiped up. The girl ran up to Jenna, gave her a quick hug, and then, eager to hide her newly polished toenails, ran off up the stairs, stepping on the napkin once more.

Huh, the older woman thought to herself. Emily seemed in a bit of a rush. I do hope she's okay. Slipping her shoes off by the door, Jenna headed towards the stairs. The napkin, now a forgotten distraction, fell beneath her steps and was flattened once more.

"I'll check on her after I change into something more comfortable," the mother told herself.
1313311212112112.title: Escaped Napkin

choices: You are stuck to Jenna's foot.
You are stuck to Emily's foot.

choices: You're with her
You're on the floor
13133112121122.content:
"Number 52! Frosty, two cheeseburgers, large fries and a small drink?"

Jenna looked up from the pictures she was showing her friend. "Oh, I think that's ours."

"I've got it." Cynthia pushed her feet back into her flip flops, feeling the grainy surface scrape against her sole. It might be time to get a new pair...

She walked across the restaurant, her heel slapping against the foam with every step. She was painfully aware of how loud it was. Hopefully it didn't bother anyone. Yeah, it's definitely time for a new pair.

The teen at the counter looked bored, chewing piece of gum as she waited. "Order 52?" she asked to the room again.

"Hi, yes. That'd be me, order 52." As she grabbed the tray, Cynthia looked at the girl. She was familiar, maybe from a class she had taught once. The girl seemed to share a similar thought, as her expression began to change. "Miss Murphy?"

Cynthia smiled. "Mrs. Lancaster now, actually. Oh my god, Casey, right? How has it been? You're so much bigger than the last time I saw you!"

The two began to talk, reminiscing and gossiping and catching up. Idly, Cynthia slipped her feet out of her flip flops and stood on the cold linoleum barefooted. Bits of dirt transferred both ways, as her filth stuck to the restaurant and the restaurant's filth stuck to her.

"It's so good to see you again. I've got to take this food to my friend, and you've got to get back to work, so I'll leave you be." Both girls smiled, as Cynthia slipped her feet back into the shoes and returned to the table.
13133112121122.title: Acquaintance

choices: Home
Elsewhere
131331121211221.content:
When her foot came down, it did so with the force of an atom bomb, pushing the cities of filth and grime that had grown in her footprint deep down into the worn foam, engulfing the world from horizon to horizon in wrinkled, unrelenting weight. The speck you had become was among the carnage, pressed deep into the layer of dirt and old sweat with the weight of the world behind it, limbs twisted in unnatural positions and splayed about, treated like less than garbage, less than worthless.

Then she stepped up. At first, the heel went alone, the toes pressing down on the front of the flip flop, giving the surface a chance to breathe and reform. But the moment passes quickly, and the shoe rushes up to fill in the void left behind, held to the foot by the thin plastic strap between the toes. Skin meets heel with a crack like a gunshot that roars across existence, bloodying the ears of the only speck close enough and entrapped enough to hear it. The force here is enough to hold the mucky shoe to the woman's sole, applying just enough pressure to make movement and impossibility.

Then she steps down again. The whole process, from the destruction on the ground to the destruction in the air, of un-explainable force and weight, of taste and touch and smell and sound, took just under a second. Yet the pain felt by you dragged it out, extending your time frame to the near infinite. Every minute shift of skin, every unnoticeable drop of sweat, every invisible fleck of dirt was massive to you, in size, in distance, in length. Her walk to the counter was composed of twenty steps, each unique in the way that the foot pressed down and the shoe bounced up. Her walk back was just as long, twenty one steps, and it too was filled with individual tortures indescribable to those who've not experienced them.

You remained stuck to the woman, transitioning from the sole to the shoe, but never moving far from those extremes. The dulling of your senses made time feel irrelevant, and between the destruction of each step you were only half aware when the giant left the Wendy's and headed out to...
131331121211221.title: Armageddon

choices: You are still glued beneath Cynthia's foot
You are glued to Cynthia's flip-flop
1313311212112211.content:
Cynthia opened the front door to her house, sighing contently. She decided to take the rest of the day off. Walking into the kitchen made the sounds of her flip flops even more apparent and she frowned.

Yeah, it was definitely time for a new pair.

Kicking them off, she reached down and chucked the disposable footwear into her kitchen's garbage can, the lid slamming harshly as she took her foot off the pedal. She then poured herself a drink and walked into the living room, dropping onto the couch.

Propping her feet up, Cynthia surfed channels trying to find something decent to watch. A news story caught her eye. Something about shrinking? She listened to the news casters talk about cases of people drastically losing their height.

Shrinking... she chuckled to herself. Yeah I can't even imagine dealing with that.

Taking a sip from her drink, she propped up her barefeet on the coffee table, crossing them at the ankles. She then grabbed at her phone, looking for deals for a cute new pair of sandals.
1313311212112211.title: Home

choices: Cynthia is stepping into a pair of sneakers and going for a jog
Cynthia is stepping into a pair of low-cut flats and walking to the library
13133112121122111.content:
Muttering, you tried to pry your face from the warm wall of flesh you've been pressed into, but either you were just too weak, or the oblivious woman's footsteps have pressed you so thoroughly into her sole that you've basically become a part of her foot. In the distance, you can hear the sounds of the news on a TV, but it's hard to make out everything due to the amplified nature and the thick rubbing sounds of the wrinkles in the foot's soles as your captor flexes them. Something about shrinking...? Is it possible that you're not the only one that is suffering from this condition? You need to get this woman to realize that you're down here!

Suddenly, the foot swerves through the air at breakneck speed, and you wince as the floor rises up rapidly before everything goes black. Once again immeasurable pressure smashes you over and over into the unforgiving sole as the woman strolls through the hall of her house, the wooden floor creaking and groaning beneath her weight. Your consciousness is being jarred from you with each step. You're terrified that if you black out here you won't wake up...

Everything veers up, and you can just make out the mouth of a shoe beneath you, your captor's foot ready to plunge in...
13133112121122111.title: Under the Weight

choices: You fall out into the library
You stay with Cynthia/her shoes
131331121211221112.content:
The short walk was nice, though the late afternoon air was still a bit stuffy. Cynthia entered the library and stood for a moment, curling her toes in pleasure at the cool, air conditioned atmosphere.
