She still had two more bathrooms on the second floor to take care of before she could go home. As she walked through the hallways, the filthy janitor met every disgusted stare from each cubicle queen with a glare of her own as she passed. She wasn’t going to let them just judge her like that without giving a little back.

Finally, she stepped aboard the elevator and smashed the button to go down. As she waited for the elevator to arrive, she absentmindedly fingered the earring in her pocket. It’s going to bring her the best paycheck she’s had in a long time. The bell dinged and she rolled the cart aboard. Only a couple more hours and she can finally go home.

With all the trash collected and sinks scrubbed, the tired employee punched her time card before she punched anyone in the face. Grabbing her gym bag out of her locker, she ducked into a freshly-cleaned bathroom and took her street clothes out of her bag. Placing the illicitly-gained earring on the toilet tank, she stripped out of her sweaty janitor uniform and tossed it aside. She took a quick glance at her poverty-skinny body and put on a profanity-laden t-shirt and tight-fitting shorts. Hearing someone enter the bathroom, Lysa quickly scooped up the earring and tossed it in her bag, which still contained yesterday’s dirty gym clothes; she made a mental note to wash those when she got home before they started growing mold. She tossed the uniform into the laundry basket in the locker room, where some poor slob will cart it away to the dry-cleaning company.

The sun beat down on the parking lot as Lysa made her way to her beat-up car. A blast of trapped heat greeted her as she opened the door and tossed her bag on the back seat. The driver’s seat squeaked as she sat down and turned the key in the ignition. The unloved engine groaned to live with a cough before settling into a regular burble. She wanted to get home as soon as possible so she can put her new earring in a safe place until she can figure out what to do with it. She picked at a broken piece of plastic trim on the dashboard with a dark-painted thumbnail while wondering if the local pawn shop will ask too many questions about how she acquired it. Maybe she could sell it online. The rusty car rumbled out of the parking lot, towards the bad part of town that contained Lysa’s rathole apartment.
1332221111.title: Pocket Pal

choices: You successfully get to the earring
You fail to get to the earing
13322211111.content:
Pockets are not fun rides. They swoosh and swing with the littlest of movements, and there is never a moment of stillness, especially not when massive gloved digits kept popping in to give the earring a fondle. It was better than being in the woman's stomach, for sure, but that wasn't saying a whole lot. So, when the fingers descended without gloves on, you took your chances and hitched a ride out on the jewelry.

It was disorienting, to say the least. You went from near dark to shining light, and then were immediately dropped on a cold, white plain. Stumbling to your feet, you rubbed the spots from your eyes and flipped your massive captor the bird. She didn't notice.

You watched her change, the first time you've really had to see who snatched you from the trash. She was scrawny, thin and sickly in a way that suggested she wasn't getting quiet enough to eat. When she lifted her arms and removed her shirt, you could clearly see each rib outlined in the tattooed skin. Still, you got the sense that she wasn't weak or frail; a little hungry, sure, but behind the skinny arms and thin stomach, you could see a vicious, fight or flight ferocity that you didn't want to mess with. Maybe she wasn't the right choice to help you out here. Not that you had a lot of available options...

Footsteps from the far side of the room. She turns, and quickly reaches for her little diamond prize. You're swept up in her grasp, and in the time it takes to blink you found yourself thrust into a bag of old clothes. The fabric you bounce over is ratty, worn stuff, clearly having been in use for some time. It also smells. No, not smells; it reeks. The stench of old, stale sweat is thick as butter in the air, making it hard to breath as you try to catch your breath. It reminds you of the woman's stomach, actually; not exactly the same, but just as overpowering and repulsive as her gastric stew.

The whole bag shifted. You look up towards the zipper, just in time to be thrown aside as the girl picked up her things and started walking. The clothes shift massively with each step, and you stumble along the surface of a cloth ocean. A gap between a graying gym sock and a stained shirt opens up, and to your horror the earring, a piece of metal and gem the size of a large car, is swallowed whole. You dive after it; it was your last connection to the giantess above, and you weren't going to be lost in this bag without it.

The light that leaked in from above is lost as you sink beneath the layers. Blindly, you feel around for the jewelry. Your hand wraps about the cold metal. You pull at it, but an especially rough bump sends a lose strand of string at you. It whips across your face, sending you back through another hole in another garment. You tumble down, smashing against nasty, damp clothes: gym socks and training bras and old shorts, all of which hungrily accept you into their folds. Above, fibers; below, threads; in front, cloth; to the back, strings. As you get deeper and deeper, it gets harder and harder to breath. Your mind gets blurry, but when you finally stop sinking you immediately get back up. You had to get to that earring. Pushing through clothes that needed a wash more than Pig Pen did, you can only hope you'll find it before the girl wants it back.
13322211111.title: Dirty Laundry

choices: You stay on her stomach
You are knocked into her panties
133222111111.content:
Cracked pavement and boarded-up windows indicated that Lysa had arrived at her neighborhood. Police sirens rang out from across the block as she parked her car on the street. She grabbed her bag from the back seat and slammed the door shut, not bothering to lock it because that would only lead to a busted side window. There was nothing worth stealing in there anyway. The sagging wooden steps creaked under her boots as the stomped her way up to her second-floor apartment. As soon as she was across the threshold, she started up the washer and unzipped her bag. The clothes cascaded into the machine in a linen waterfall. Shit! The earring! Lysa dumped the remaining clothes out on the floor, hands desperately searching for her prize. Panties and shirts went flying in all directions as she dumped each one out in turn, hoping for the shiny meal ticket to drop out. Each empty pocket was met with a curse. Finally, the earring dropped out of a bra cup and bounced onto the tile floor. Sighing with relief, she jammed the earring into a pocket of her too-tight shorts for safe-keeping while she scooped up and threw the rest of the clothes into the machine.

Now that today’s chores are done with, time for a shower! The dirty dishes can wait, time to get the stink of work off. Also the stink of sweat and puke. She filled a bathroom cup with water and placed the earring inside to rinse off whatever horribleness was in that trash can, hoping that diamond doesn’t rust. Stripping off her clothes, she jumped into the shower. The curtain was ripped and she lived alone anyway, so there’s no point in using it. The water felt great as it cascaded down her body, washing away all the sweat and grime.

After toweling off, the parolee slipped on a tank top and panties. The warm day made wearing anything else impractical. That, and the air conditioner was still broken. Lysa turned the bathroom cup over, letting the water run between her fingers and keeping the earring in her palm. She wasn’t going to almost lose it down the drain a second time. Lifting it up to her own ear, she thought about just keeping it for herself. Maybe not, gaudy gold wasn’t really her style. Looking at herself in the mirror, her roots told her it was time to dye her hair again soon. Perhaps she’ll try purple next time.

But anyway, it was time to celebrate! Finds like this don’t come around every day. Placing the earring on the messy coffee table next to the overflowing ash tray, Lysa dragged her bong out from under the couch. She hadn’t toked up in forever, and what are the chances she’ll get dragged to a drug test? Being able to hold down a job and “demonstrate independence” should be enough to let her enjoy herself every now and then. She felt so good that she even broke out the Good Stuff. With as much as that earring must be worth, Lysa knew she could buy lots of the best leaf around. Taking a deep hit, she let the smoke percolate inside her chest. Ah… that’s the stuff. She laid back and blew a smoke ring, watching it rise up to the water-damaged ceiling. Man, it’s really been a while since she toked. She was getting sleepy already. Placing the earring next to her belly button, she contemplated getting it pierced. Can you even pierce a belly button with an earring? One of the guys down at the tattoo shop would probably know. It would have to wait for her next paycheck anyway. She took another hit. Either this stuff is stronger than she remembered, or her tolerance went way down, because her eyelids were suddenly very heavy. Sticking her hand down into her panties, she gave her crotch a quick scratch. She thought about ordering a pizza, then closed her eyes, sound asleep… zzz…
133222111111.title: Home sweet Hell

choices: The earring
Lysa's bellybutton
1332221111111.content:
The clothes parted in a hurricane of force as the woman dug through her bag. Pants and socks and shirts and panties all went flying, soaring miles above you. She was looking for the earring, and by proxy you, but at this rate you were worried she'd miss it's hiding spot, nestled safely in a bra cup. You were safe, too, having jammed yourself in the smallest of golden rings that held the dangling diamonds to the gold hook. As long as she found it, you'd be going for the ride.

Suddenly, giant fingers grab at the edge of the bra. You look up at the girl, following the long expanse of tatted arm to her face. She wasn't looking in your direction.

The bra went tumbling as she knocked it away, and your earring tumbled along. It, and you, rolled along a rough wooden floor, clattering to a stop a few real-sized feet away. That got the giant's attention; you could almost feel the relief on her face a she quickly snatched you up. You were dropped into a tight pocket (again with the pockets!) and whisked away.

A few more tumbly minutes, and she reaches back for you. A harrowing second passes where her fingernail slams dangerously close to your head, giving you a chance to see your disheveled reflection in her nearly black nail polish, but then you're back in the air. That too passes, as she drops the earring into a cup of water.

You weren't expecting that. Water flows into your throat as you take an instinctive gasp. You clutch at your neck, trying to hold back the choking sensation, then you grab at the metal around your waist, trying to free yourself. The burning in your lungs intensifies; you begin to struggle and panic. More out of fear than anything else, you faint.

A familiar smell awakens you some time later. To your left is the earring, to your right is a hole in your fleshy ground, and up ahead were two mountains, covered in more ratty fabric. It's all very strange, and you feel like you should be able to place it, but your mind is foggy, unclear, and you're having trouble forming clear thoughts.

And that odor was there, too. There were a lot of smells in the air: bodywash, sweat, a hint of old, stale puke. But those were all faint. The strongest smell... It was definitely something your remembered, something from your years in the dorms...

Your mind just didn't want to work. Actually, neither did you. You slumped back to the soft ground, and stared at the patterns inked all along it. They were really pretty. With a contented grunt, you rolled over, right towards...

choices: Lysa pokes at the hallucination
Lysa shrugs and forgets about the tiny man
13322211111111.content:
Lysa scratched idly as she woke, A moment or two to collect her thoughts, then she rose the earring in front of her face, smirking at how its jewel catches the light. So pretty, so tempting to keep rather than sell...

Is that... is that a tiny little man clinging to the side of it? Blinking, Lysa looked to the bong on the table. She didn't take that much did she? Smiling and laughing, she jiggled the earring, watching as the tiny man desperately clung to it, for fear of falling down into her lap. She told herself it was just an hallucination, a literal power fantasy, but she didn't care. There was nothing else to worry about in that moment...
13322211111111.title: Dude, You're So Small

choices: Grab hold of the finger, become its friend...
Jump from the earring, let the wind take you...
133222111111111.content:
Lysa's gigantic eyes lock with yours as you cling to the jewel of the earring. A smile tears her face open, freeing gigantic teeth to bare themselves at you. Recognition at last! Now you can -

The earring shakes, and you cling tighter as it jiggles side to side. The woman laughs, and you're washed in pot smoke as she exhales, smashing your own brain into a state of bafflement. As she pokes at you with the tip of her finger, your reaction isn't one of a sane thought process...
133222111111111.title: A Giant Stoner

choices: Lysa takes the man outside
Lysa takes the man to her room
1332221111111111.content:
Lysa continued to goggle as the tiny figure dropped from the earring to her finger. It brought a smile to her face as he scampered along it toward her, stumbling over the ridges in her skin as he did so.

"Man, my hands must seem SO BIG to you right now..."

He neared the edge of her palm, so she brought up the other hand, the man dropping between the two stretches of skin and showing no indication of stopping, despite the tough going over the terrain. SO determined!

"Typical," Lysa muttered. "I start hallucinating and I can't even imagine a man with a nice, thick cock to keep me warm..."

The man's progress was almost hypnotic as he proceeded to scurry along her hands, alternating between them as she brought each one up as a bridge in turn. The bleating of her phone was an annoying distraction.

"Shut up!" she yelled, kicking at the table with her bare foot. She connected with the phone, sending it skidding out of view, still warbling.

"That's ruined the mood," she muttered, cupping her hand to keep the little man penned in a crater of flesh he couldn't scale. "Sorry about that. But I'm sure there's something else we can do before I come down form this..."
1332221111111111.title: Lysa the Landscape

choices: Climb free right now
Wait to talk with Lysa
Escape once Lysa's hand opens
13322211111111112.content:
Sense returns as the walls of the woman's hand surround you. Shaking your head, you try to make sense of the last few minutes. You haven't eaten or drunk anything, so it must have been something you breathed in... probably something that giantess breathed out...

You scramble to your feet, hacking and coughing, and lean against the warm surface at the base of the thumb. If she's high, even if she's seen you, you won't think you're real... And even if she sobers up, she may disregard your presence!

There's nothing to see but the indomitable flesh around you, but you can feel her footsteps reverberating through the ground as she walks, clearly taking you somewhere. Perhaps the exercise will clear her head? If someone as tiny as you threw off the effects so quickly, surely a beast as massive as her must have a constitution to match! Unless the inverse is true, and your tiny 'condition' makes your metabolism work more quickly...

The ridges in her skin are enough to climb by - if you wanted, you could climb free of here and try to escape. You could drop back into anonymity, which is surely better than being seen and abused by a stoner.

Then again, that's a lot of work - you could stay here and wait for the woman to look at you again. Now you're clear-headed you can try to communicate with her! Hopefully she'll be sensible enough to pay attention.

It could be too late to escape by the time you try that, so the third option would be a combination of the other two - wait for her to open her hand, but use that opportunity to run away!
13322211111111112.title: Entertainments?

choices: The little man is standing before her eyes
The little man is nowhere to be seen
Lysa has been woken by a very annoyed parole officer
133222111111111122.content:
Lysa slumped down onto her bed raising her feet up to sit in the middle, knees arched. She pondered the tiny man in her palm, and how he seemed to have ceased his random wanderings. He certainly wasn't scared, and he was so tiny that he probably should have been.

Tipping her hand, she let the dude roll off onto her bed, near the toes of her right foot. He scrambled to his feet as she wiggled her digits, noting how massive they seemed to him: next to her tiny feet, he was but a speck!

Lysa laughed. It would take him so long just to walk the length of her foot, from her coiling toes to her solid mass of heel, would take him so long! Oh, he'd have to take a taxi to get to her ass!

Squinting, she looked closer at the spot of a man. If he was that big, how big would a taxi be? She struggled to pinch the size between finger and thumb as she held them both in the air above him, and then smiled again at how easy it would be for her to crush such a vehicle.

Her jaw lowered along with her hand as her drug-addled brain made its next connection. If a car was that small, what about a house? An apartment building?

Her eyes fell upon her heel again, which the tiny man was hiking past. How many storeys tall would it be? How far to her knee..?

She let her head fall back onto the pillow, thoughts of scale calculation running through her mind, a new and exciting concept. Eyelids lowered, and her brain pictured the outcome for her, striding through a miniscule city, feet smashing aside all the lesser, insect-like people.

All those that had mocked her, had looked down on her, would finally get theirs. The school? Dust beneath her sole. The courthouse would be kicked flat. And you'd better believe that any policemen she saw would be ground out like the shitty bugs they were.

Visions of dominance whirled through her, prompted by the little man and accentuated by the drugs in her system. She didn't even notice when they became true dream, as she slipped into sleep...

And when she woke, refreshed and sober...

Her free hand covered her mouth as she yawned, and then she giggled slightly as the man squirmed. "I'm not gonna eat you, dipshit," she reassured him, "but I could do with a little breakfast."

Or she could do a little work herself, search the internet for shrunken men, and those that wanted to buy them. How hard could it be?

Lysa’s eyes flickered open as the coffee table began to sing. Wait, it wasn’t the table itself, just her cell phone sitting on top. The ringtone spat out various expletives to a driving beat before she picked it up. Glancing at the screen with bloodshot eyes, she noticed that it was her friend Erika. The voice on the phone informed Lysa that she had just gotten off of work herself and wanted to know if the janitor wanted to hit up the gym for a bit. The pothead would rather go to a bar, but maybe she could hit up her friend for a meal after they worked out. All that toking had made her ravenous, and the fridge was currently empty. She planned on hanging out near the treadmills until her friend was done, then casually suggest grabbing a bite to eat. At least she had the presence of mind to ask Erika to pick up her up, as she knew she was still way too high to drive.

She figured she was already dressed appropriately for the gym, so she simply slipped on a pair of badly worn-out off-brand sneakers and grabbed a towel. Not wanting to leave the earring behind, in case, you know, someone stole the stolen object, she grabbed it and inserted it into her own ear, not caring that it looked totally mismatched with the empty hole in the opposite ear.

A car horn honked from the street, Erika’s signal that she arrived. Locking the door behind her, Lysa shuffled down the steps and sat in the passenger seat of the car. It was a newer model sedan, certainly much better than her own rustbucket. Erika gave her friend a playful shove as she smelled Lysa’s pot stench wafting off her skin.

“You dog. Aren’t you still on parole?” she said, looking at Lysa over her black-rimmed glasses.

“Give me a break, it’s alright. I had a great day at work, so I’m celebrating.”

“You had better hope I don’t get pulled over,” Erika snarked, as she pulled onto the street and drove toward the gym, as the last rays of sunlight began to dip below the horizon.

…

“Look, they have hot yoga classes now!” Erika said excitedly. Always one to try the latest diet fat, the constantly slightly-overweight brunette had one fatal flaw that prevented her from ever losing those final pounds: she was a huge pothead. In fact, Lysa was her dealer before she went away. But she had a good heart, as evidenced by the fact that she drove her friend home the day she was released from prison. Still, she couldn’t wait to ask her friend if they could go back to Lysa’s apartment and toke up after working out.

Only wanting to please her friend long enough to get some food out of her, Lysa took off her shoes and shuffled over to an empty spot on the mat next to Erika. Many of the heavier clients glared at the colorful tattoos inked on her rail-thin body. Soon enough, the instructor appeared and began to guide the group through the first lesson. Rivulets of sweat began to run down her stomach and began to collect in her navel. She wiped herself off with a towel and contorted into the next posture.

Explaining her cost-benefit analysis to her partners, she subconsciously slipped her feet free from the thin black flats she was wearing, pressing her warm soles into the center leg of the table and relishing the slightly grainy feel of the cool metal.

Boring, thought Abigail, twisting her messy brown hair with her fingers while Mari droned on. As rude as Cel had been, she had a point. Morning in the Stevenson household is like morning anywhere else. Jenna and Tim wake up earlier than they'd like; they briefly squabble over who has to go grab the paper (Jenna loses the argument this time. Tim probably will tomorrow), and then they go wake the kids. Emily's easy -- seven years old isn't too bad. The oldest two, however, are much tougher. Brianna is 14 and Jake is 16, and neither one wakes up before noon willingly.

Still, it's not that bad. At least their schedules are reasonably in sync. Tim leaves around 7:30 for the office, followed by Jenna at 8:15 -- she drops Emily on the way in to work. The teens are both in high school now, and Jake can drive, so they take off at 8:30 -- not that Jake likes driving his sister into school, but since he'd lose his car if he didn't, he puts up with it.

And so they gather 'round the breakfast table, with the older teens sullen and sleep-deprived, Emily her usual bundle of energy, and Tim and Jenna trying to impose order on the day.

"So, what's going on after school?" Jenna asks, pouring milk on Emily's cereal.

"I have soccer practice," Brianna yawns.

"Great. Do I have to wait around for her?" complains Jake.

"No, I can pick her up. What are you doing, though, that it's an issue?" asks Tim.

"He's got a date tonight," says Brianna.

"It's just a...thing," mutters Jake.

The conversation continues on for a moment, until Tim has to go to work; he walks over to the shoes, bends down, and slips his foot into the first half of his pair of dress shoes. He looks down at the second, and slides that on, too. Straightening up, he opens up the door, and heads out to his car, yawning and quickly closing the door behind him.

You were trapped out here now, with no chance for help until someone decided to come home. And how long would that take? The day was sunny, but could your shrunken form take the harsh, outdoors environment? And what about predators? You were snack sized to a whole lot of different things now.

Getting back into the house would be ideal, now that you think more about it. However, a quick check shows a rubber stopper lining the gap under the door, to keep out bugs like you. Like it or not, you weren't going back in there for a while.

You were about to resume your earlier sulking when you heard a familiar sound, a repeated thumping. Footsteps. You turn around as a shadow is cast over the stoop, revealing the approaching feet of...
14123.title: Outdoors

choices: You were crushed
You survived
141231.content:
Ding dong

...

Ding dong

...

"I don't think anyone is home."

Amanda shook her head, her red hair flying about her shoulders. "That's four empty houses in a row. What kinda luck is that?"

"Maybe the next one will be luckier." Nadia bent over, kneeling on the front stoop. A flyer was shoved under the door frame, advertising the delicious and surprisingly expensive cookies the two girls had in their little red wagon.

Maybe we shouldn't have tried to sell these," Amanda began, gesturing to the cookies, "on a weekday." She sat down on the concrete and fell back. "But we can't just give up, or Mia will win the top prize!"

"Look, we're like this buggy." With her green Keds, Nadia pointed to a small speck scurrying across the step. "We're trying our hardest, but when Mia comes over with her rich family, it's like someone coming to step on us." She shifted her foot over the bug, "And, no matter how hard we try to beat her, she comes out on top." With her last word, she brought her foot down, crushing the bug under her weight.

With a sigh, Amanda began to stand back up. "Well, we've got to try."
141231.title: Sales Pitch

choices: Fabric of her uniform
Steel of the cookie wagon
1412312.content:
Curled up in a ball and cowering, you could only watch as the brown skinned girl's foot came down...

...And obliterated the spider that had been chasing you.

The other girl, the pale one with the fiery hair, began to stir. Her hand came flying towards you as she began to sit up, her palm smacking against the warm concrete. You flinch, but the charm bracelet jingling on her enormous wrist catches your eye. You leap for it, clutching to a shiny silver dolphin as her arm soared through the air.

She reached up and brushed the red strands of hair away from her face, bringing you within inches of her mouth. You tighten your grip on the dolphin's fin, but lips part, and she bellows out a reply to her friend. "Well, we've got to try."

The force of a hurricane shatters your grip. You smash into her wrist, and the soft skin acts like a trampoline. Hurdling down through the air in front of this little girl, you grab out, reaching for something, anything, to keep you from exploding against the ground. And surprisingly enough, your hand wraps around something. The sudden stop nearly pulls your shoulder out, but you hold tight against the...
1412312.title: Stolen

choices: No-one's home
The girls get lucky this time
14123121.content:
Nadia shrugged, leading the way back to the front gate. "At least it's not raining, I suppose."

Amanda smoothed down her uniform after standing, before dragging the cart along after. "We just need to think positive! We're not useless bugs, we're more like... like..."

Searching for a metaphor, the girl grinned as a garbage truck chugged along the street. "We're like that truck, slow, but if you get in our way, look out!"

"...And we stink?" Nadia laughed.

The girls stopped giggling as the passed the gate of the next house up the street. "There's a car," Amanda noted. "Maybe they're still at home?"

"If they're not, I'm going to have to find a lot more bugs to crush!" Nadia retorted, eyes scanning the garden path already.

"Oh, shush!" her friend sighed. "Now put on a smile and remember your lines!"

One finger is raised to the doorbell, and presses it inward.
14123121.title: Next House

choices: Out of curiously, you go towards it and take a closer look
You decide to go and hide somewhere, trying to avoid getting crushed
141231211.content:
"Better hold on!" you said while clutching on to the folds of this girl's uniform. With all your might, you carefully climbed upwards across her shirt, hoping to reach somewhere safe. Unfortunately you were too late, the girl scout stood up from the ground, causing you to tumble down but manage to quickly grab the hem of her shirt. "That was a close call." you sigh in relief. Suddenly, everything around you turned dark and when you look up, your heart sank when you saw the giantess's enormous hand brushing across her shirt. There's no way to avoid it as you were smacked by the hand and fall into the great abyss.

You screamed as you fall straight to the great unknown. You thought that you will drop to the ground but instead you landed on something soft. Looking around, you see a set of giant laces and found out that you were on this young girl's shoe. Quickly, you held on to the shoelaces as she began to walk towards to the next house along with her friend.

Several seconds have passed and soon they reached the next home but you already began to feel nauseous after being lifted up and down by the giant redhead's footsteps. You can hear the sounds of a doorbell echoing around you, following a few more until after about four times, you were suddenly jolted upwards as the young girl stomps her foot in frustration. It happened so fast that you got blown away from her shoe and into the concrete ground.

After getting up from ground, your eyes grew wide when you saw an incoming shoe (belong to the same girl that almost crushed you from earlier) going straight towards you. You curled into a ball and waited for your upcoming death when suddenly...she stops.

At the far distance, you hear a sound that could be described as a loud car horn. This catches both you and the girls attention as a large, luxurious-looking car came into view.
141231211.title: Tagging along

choices: You ended up inside Mia's car
You were still standing in the middle of the sidewalk
1412312111.content:
By the looks of the car, the girls quickly recognized who it was as the driver came out and open the door. Coming from inside was none other than their archrival, Mia herself.

"My my hello there, Amanda and Nadia." said Mia "I see that you two are still struggling to sell those cookies, am I right?"

"What do you even want, Mia?" asked Nadia.

"Why to come to this house but by the looks of it, nobody's home right now." answered Mia with a smile. "It was nice try but even if you somehow got the chance, you two will still have long way to go to win top prize."

"Oh please, don't you even know what you are up against? We're not just ordinary scouts, we're garbage trucks!" said Amanda with a proud expression "We're slow but watch out, we're powerful!"

"...and on our way to the dump once Mia wins yet again!" Mia added and laughed "Here's a little advice: Don't try selling your cookies on weekdays if you really wanted to win glory."

The girls looked at Mia with irritated looks on their faces; they clearly have nothing else to say.

Mia went back inside the car and said "See you girls later!" as the driver shut the door and went back inside. The two watch as the car drove away and out of sight.
1412312111.title: The arrival of a rival

choices: School
Her luxurious home
The airport
14123121111.content:
A third girl scout. Great. Even as the foot due to crush you retracts and steps away, the newcomer takes its place, smashing down upon you with irresistible pressure. Treads do not crush you but rather trap you between them, carrying you with their immense owner effortlessly.

So, you're in the dark, caught like so much chewing gum to the bottom of a shoe. But as Mia climbs back inside her car, her grating against the carpet tears at your back.

Maybe you'll get a chance to escape when she reaches her destination...
14123121111.title: The Rich, Always Stepping on the Little Guy

choices: At her bedroom where she's taking a nap
At the backyard as she's trying to catch some rays
At the laundry so they can wash her shoes
141231211112.content:
"Tee hee hee, those fools will never have the idea who they're up against." chuckled Mia "Maybe once I beat them again, they'll finally learn the hard way for constantly going against an expert like myself." After making tons of money from selling many of her cookie boxes, it's time to take a little breather at her manor. She has absolutely no worry about the competition because for being so high up, the other scouts will have a hard time getting ahead of her. "Take me back home Calvin, I'm planning to take a break from all that marketing. Don't worry, I'll soon get back later on."

"Yes Miss Mia." replied Calvin as he drove to all the way to her house.

About two minutes or so, the car finally arrives at the luxurious home of Mia. It was a large and wide mansion that was yellow-orange in color. Calvin opened the door for her and she walks out of the car. Being the daughter of the CEO of a successful shoemaking company, it's no surprise that she's quite skilled at making businesses herself and using that to win top prize quicker than anybody else; she hopes that she'll finally be able to take over the company herself.

She enters her home and went to the place where she would like to go. After she arrive there, she removes her shoes which unknowingly carried a tiny being underneath it.

Where is she right now?
141231211112.title: Arriving At Her Home

choices: The red-haired girl (Amanda)
Her colleague (Nadia)
Neither
14123121112.content:
The giant girl scouts confer with a third of their number in booming tones that sound as nothing more than distant thunder. It's relief that they haven't crushed you, and as you watch their tremendous feet steadily hold up impossible amounts of flesh so far above, you wonder what you should do.

These girls, if you can contact them, may be able to help you! That's part of their code, right? So, you could approach and climb the shoe of one of these goliaths and get one step closer to recognition. Question is, which should you go for? The third girl climbs back into her car, so that leaves two: the red-haired girl who brushed you off her uniform, or the darker child that crushed the spider underfoot. Not much to go on, really.

Of course, you could leave these two to their work and hurry off elsewhere, looking for a third option. It's a big, wide world out there, after all.
14123121112.title: Girl Scouts are Helpful, Right?

choices: You are already on Amanda's shoulder
You were still climbing Amanda's shoe
You ended up inside Amanda's shoe by accident
141231211121.content:
"That Mia, everytime she's ahead and on top, she's alway meeting us like this to mock us." yelled Nadia while shaking her fist in the air.

"Calm down Nadia, I'm sure we can still beat her by now." Amanda said, still confident with herself.

"Yeah....hope so." groaned Nadia. Unlike Amanda, her self-esteem have decreased thanks to Mia.

Amanda frowned at Nadia after hearing her unhappy tone of voice. "C'mon Nadia, don't let that snobbish snob get you like that. So what if we ended up in the dump, what she didn't know is the fact that the garbage truck has the ability to climb back up from the junkyard and into the road again."

Nadia smiled after hearing her friend's support and grabs the wagon's handle. You're right, we can't just sit here and let Mia step on us any longer, it's time for action."

The two determined girls walk across the sidewalk; finding any houses to sell.
141231211121.title: Determination

choices: Amanda and Nadia stop at the front door across the road
Amanda and Nadia are stopped by a passerby
Amanda stops to tie her shoelace
1412312111212.content:
You're going to have to learn to manage your expectations.

You had imagined scampering upwards in a trice, scaling the heights before these two walked off. Insects do it all the time! But you have a human anatomy, and are unused to the ardour of climbing a being who could hold the Statue of Liberty like a pencil-topper.

No, by the time the girls recommence their journey, you're only just pulling your unfit ass over the crest of the shoe's toe, and are thus pressed deeply into its leathery surface by the sheer force of the giant's strides.

She takes many, many strides as well, so there's nothing you can do during her journey other than cling tight and pray that it ends soon. Each step this red-head takes is agony, as you are swung through the air, clinging to a monolith bigger than a street terrible distances from the ground, with a bone-jarring impact shuddering you too often for you to keep track.

When will this end? What will bring her stroll to an end, and give you a chance to resume your climb?
1412312111212.title: You were still climbing Amanda's shoe

14123121112123.content:
While the girls walk across the sidewalk in search of any houses that might have someone inside, Nadia stops and look down at Amanda's feet. "Hey Amanda, I think your shoe is about to go lose." she said while pointing at her friend's right shoe. Amanda looks down and realized that she was right; one of the loops have got loose so there was a long lace sticking out of the knot. "Well I guess it doesn't hurt to tie my shoe for a moment." said Amanda. "Don't worry, I'll try to do some looking around the house while you do your shoelace tying." said Nadia and looks around. Amanda bents over and begins to tie her shoelace.

Nadia searches around the neighborhood and wonders if they really should be selling at weekends. Her eyes finally spots a house across the street; which was nearly far from where they are. There was a house with a car and not only that, she could have sworn she saw someone behind one of the windows. "I'm done!" said Amanda who finished tying her shoe and got up. "I found it! A house with someone inside." said Nadia as she pointed to the house she was looking at. "Are you sure there's someone there?" asked Amanda and Nadia nodded "I really saw someone at their window so I just know there's someone."

The girls walked across the street to the home Nadia suggested.

Meanwhile...
14123121112123.title: Amanda stops to tie her shoelace

choices: Amanda brushes her hair back
Amanda fist-bumps Nadia
Amanda reaches into her pocket
141231211121232.content:
She stops. Praise God, she stops. You take a moment to relax the grip that had almost torn your fingernails from your hands and flex some feeling back into your fingers, and then the shadow overtakes you.

Above, the girl bends at the knees, her colossal upper body descending toward you faster than an avalanche. That face, with those see-all eyes, hovers above like a meteor moments from impact. Yet that gaze is not upon you, but further yet up the slope of her shoe.

Ahead, it seems as if the mass of laces has become dishevelled, trailing from the area behind the giant's steps. You were up there last time you were atop this foot, and should count yourself lucky you weren't caught up in that!

Now, great fingers bigger than the mightiest trees are curling themselves as they work at the task of retying the thick ropes to restrain this leathery shoe about the crushing foot it contains. It's no deep thought or considered reasoning that drives you toward them, but an instinctive urge to get away from the toe-end of nowhere, to rise higher, to find possible recognition.

Surging to your feet, you power your steps up along the shoe, the end goal of those fingers constantly in sight. Aiming for the smallest of the lace restraining hand - not one belonging to the hand flying over, under, in and out - you cram your tired grip into the deep grooves of the fingerprint, feeling the tired pulse of this young girl thundering through her tough exterior.

When she stands again, you vomit uncontrollably, and wonder at your destination...
141231211121232.title: The Immensity of It All

choices: You hold on tight as she brushes her hair
You were brushed off and end up onto her friend
You were brushed off and end up onto the woman
1412312111212321.content:
The girls made their way to the house that Nadia spotted and Amanda searches the windows; trying to find the alleged person inside. "I don't see anyone." she said uncertain if her friend is telling the truth. "They're probably not in the room at the moment. Let's just ring the doorbell and see for ourselves." said Nadia.

The girl scouts walk up the steps and towards the door. Amanda press the button of the doorbell and stood there; hoping the owner will answer. Nadia searches the ground for another bug to squish while Amanda holds her breath. She was getting nervous and even felt a few sweatdrops on her face.

"C'mon.....C'mon..." she muttered.

Just as Amanda was about to ring the bell again, the door finally opens and comes out the person Nadia have saw from her window. The person was a young woman in her late 20s who was impressively attractive with long black hair and green eyes. She wears a blue shirt and pair of long dark blue jeans along with red sneakers.

"May I help you?" she asked the girls. Brushing the sweat from her face and hair, she puts on a smile and pull the wagon cart into view. "Why yes, will you like to buy our delicious cookie?" she asked the lady.

"Oh my, they sure look good..." she said as she stared at the cookies. The girls stood there and wait for response from the woman. Will she accept the offer?

"I'll take it!" she said and grabbed a cookie box from the wagon. Amanda thanked the woman after she gave her some money. She wave them goodbye as they left.

Meanwhile...
1412312111212321.title: Getting Lucky For A Change

choices: She bids Nadia farewell as she heads home
She suggests they stop for a snack break
She asks Nadia to tie her hair back in a braid
14123121112123211.content:
The hand streaks through red hair, and you are lashed by the thick strands, painful as whips made of rope. Instinctively you release you hands from the girl's finger, but soon enough grip tight to her hair as the hand roars away like a helicopter.

Entwining yourself in the strands, you bring yourself around to see what the girl sees: the sexy customer at the door to whom they're selling cookies. What a woman! How you'd like to be caught up on her rather than this girl scout!

Almost in reaction to your lascivious thoughts, the door closes and the two girls turn to walk away. You're much better off up here, your hands and feet tied up in the hair to keep yourself steady, and you can allow yourself to relax while the young giantess carries you far greater distances than you could manage in one thousand times the duration.

They're chatting happily as they walk, inane babble that you try your best to ignore. But when one of those mouths is bigger than an aircraft hanger and clashing open and closed only a few inches below you, there's no ignoring Amanda's declaration...
14123121112123211.title: Hair Today

choices: ...you were tied up to her braid
...you fall off and onto the girl's friend
...you tumble down across the girl's body
141231211121232113.content:
"Did you see that, Nadia? We just stole our cookies!" said Amanda excitingly.

"Yep, I can't wait to rub it all over on Mia's face." said Nadia while laughing.

The scouts walk across the sidewalk; chatting on their recently successful sale when Amanda stops and looks at Nadia while holding a lock of her hair. Using her other hand, she takes out a long ribbon from her pocket and hands it to Nadia.

"Say Nadia, could you help tied my hair back into a braid?" asked Amanda. "While I thought that having my hair down was pretty cool, I'm starting to miss my old hair style." Amanda's hair was originally tied in a braid but three days ago, she wanted to loosen it up because she thought it would make her popular in the neighborhood with a long flowing red hair and she use it to sell more cookies but of course, it didn't really work as well she thought. Even though they sold the cookie successfully to their latest customer, Amanda decided to just be herself and don't worry too much about her looks.

Nadia frowned a bit; she really liked it alot. "Oh alright, I'll help ya out." Nadia grabs Amanda's red hair and ribbon. She begans to tie it back into her old hair style.

As her friend tie her hair back up, Amanda decided it was her turn to look around the houses while Nadia was occupied. She sees another house with a car parked in and saw what looks like someone working in the yard.

"I'm done!" called Nadia from behind as Amanda points her finger at the desired house. "Look Nadia, there's a person in the front yard. Let's go and check it out." said Amanda. Nadia grabs the wagon handle and pushes it as the two make their way to the house.

Meanwhile...
141231211121232113.title: Back In Style

choices: Climb for Nadia's head
Climb for Nadia's pocket
Try your best to climb of this giant
1412312111212321132.content:
How naive you were, to think that tying yourself up in this girl's hair would keep you secure. Every single scarlet strand covering this immense cranial mound is swept up as the crushing fingers of the other scout pull them back.

Initially, you are merely dragged up at ninety degrees, staring down the length of the giant instead of forward, and it's not too bad. Then the fingers begin brushing the hair back, from root to tip, each pass raking you with the toughened skin of the fingertips. What tangles may have been present were straightened out, and the pathetic effort you made is no exception. You are dragged along as Nadia pulls and re-pulls, the darker girls' strength irresistable.

As the hands alternate grasping the hair, you slip between them, effortlessly moved but not caught. Instead, you pop out into the air, and begin to fall toward Nadia, and impact on a surface that can only be her shirt.

This is getting ridiculous. How many times now have you been thrown around by these girls? Are they just far too active for a tiny dude like you to get their attention? Or do you just need to try harder?

Nadia will take a short while to tie up Amanda's hair, so you could head up to her face in that time. Then again, while she's occupied, you could climb into her pocket, for once in no danger of being brushed off!
1412312111212321132.title: Now You Are Nadia's

choices: You dodge Nadia's fingers as she scratches
You grab for Nadia's fingers while she scratches
You get fling off yet again by Nadia's fingers
14123121112123211321.content:
"There all done." said Nadia after finishing tying her friend's hair back into a braid. "Thanks Nadia!" said Amanda as she brushes her braid underneath it while her friend smiles. She may like her newer hair style better, but she likes seeing Amanda happy after helping her out so it's better that way. The girls walk across the sidewalk to the house were Amanda saw the owner outside. Along the way, Nadia began to scratch the side of her face after feeling slight itch coming from it; this thing could a small bug of some sort that was crawling upwards. Because she was so focused on this, she almost walk past her friend who just stop halfway there to the house.

"Something wrong?" asked Nadia

It didn't really take long for Nadia to look and notice what caught Amanda's attention. Right on the frontyard of the house and talking to the owner were four other girl scouts who are now selling the cookies to him; there were already too late.

At first, they thought it was Mia and her fellow troops who were the ones selling them; she always gets the houses that already show signs of people there more quicker than they are and after that, she'll often brag about it to their faces which irritated them. Nadia was about to go and yell at Mia to stop trying to get in their way when Amanda stops her.

"Hold on, I don't think these are Mia's group." said Amanda "Just look." Amanda pointed at the four and Nadia realized that these were actually their friends and fellow troop members: Georgette, Melissa, Eileen, and Penny. Recently, they decided to split up in order to make the sales quicker. While both Amanda and Nadia weren't doing too great at the moment, they have no idea if the other four were doing so far.

"Hi there Amanda and Nadia!" Georgette called up to them as she and the others left the house after successfully selling their cookies.

"Hello Georgette!" replied Amanda "Are you guys doing good today?"

Georgette nodded "We're selling them quite well today."

Melissa hold up the money box to the two and opens it; there were plenty of money inside which made them impressed on their progress. "Even though we didn't make too much, we still got a decent amount of cash to win that top prize." said Penny.

"Well you girls did very good job on this." said Amanda "Now I'm sure Mia and her troop won't be winning this year anymore." The six girls all laugh at that last remark, they all can't wait to see that snob's reaction to her defeat.

"Anyways Amanda, do you think we should take a break for now." asked Eileen "I mean the results won't come until tomorrow plus we been working extra hard today."

Amanda thinks about it for a bit before she finally agrees "Great idea Eileen, maybe we could all hang out in my house for a bit before finally going back to selling the cookies."

The girls all cheered and they make their way to Amanda's house for some fun.

Meanwhile...
14123121112123211321.title: Time For A Break

choices: You get no further than Nadia's mouth
You get no further than Nadia's nose
You manage to get to Nadia's eye!
You manage to get to Nadia's ear!
Someone points out the bug crawling on Nadia's face
141231211121232113211.content:
Climbing the shirt is easy. At your scale, it's rough and full of handholds. It's when you reach the collar, and the column of flesh and vertebrae rearing out of it, that you pause.

The neck of a girl scout is now an intimidating obstacle! You nearly cry, before you suck it up and carry on, digging your hands into the warm and shifting skin.

Blood pulses beneath you as you clamber upward, and with every breath shudders reverberate through you. The overhang of the chin in almost easy in comparison, climbing upside-down not as disorienting as you may have suspected. An advantage of being insect-size?

As you return to verticality, your face looking straight ahead, unwilling to be scared by either the drop beneath you or the outsize features above, the goddess speaks.

"There! All! Done!"

Three simple words, yet each sends her jaw downward, rocking you dangerously even without the return motion following. The volume itself blasts you with fury, and it's a miracle that you still cling to her.

Again you pull yourself onward, now digging your hands in with fury, scrabbling to scale as quickly as possible.

Maybe Nadia felt your redoubled efforts, or perhaps she's merely more aware now that Amanda's hair isn;t distracting her. Either way, the ship-sized pillar that smashes into the facial surface you climb can only be her finger! Skin flakes peel away from the impact, and if it hit you you'd be paste!

Luckily, rather than retract to strike again, the finger moves back and forth, the invincible nail at its terminius scraping away more infinitesimally small layers of Nadia's face in an effort to end your annoyance.

Careful now, careful: yet with the feeling from the scratching, your bothersome little handholds will not be noticeable to the behemoth. And you climb on.

Upwards, ever upwards, the mouth to your right a canyon you have no desire to close with. further up will be the nose, twin wind tunnels that could put a crimp on your day. But you now know that you CAN be felt! Contact is possible! If only you had a plan of how to go about achieving this! If only Nadia would stop breathing, scratching and talking long enough to give you time to think!
141231211121232113211.title: Face Facts

choices: You were scratched out of Nadia's ear and fall off onto the food
You were pushed deeper into Nadia's ear
You managed to survive Nadia's finger
1412312111212321132114.content:
The girls make their way to Amanda's house while talking among each other about stuff. Once they got there, Amanda takes out a key from her pocket and unlocks the door of her house. She opens the door and saw that nobody was there, or at least none in the living room.

"Right this way; my ladies." She says in a dignified tone while her friends giggled, both at her remark and her impersonation of a gentleman.

They all went inside and sat down on the sofas; they took off their shoes afterwards. They were all beat from walking with their feet aching.

"Say Amanda, is Andrea around here?" Asked Melissa "I just wanna her because she's so cool."

"Of course, she's the one put in charge around here with my parents being busy after all." Explained Amanda. Andrea was well liked by the girls for her cool personality and fun attitude. "But I don't see her right now."

"Could she still be at college right now?" Asked Nadia.

The girls thought for a moment until someone comes into the room and they noticed that they aren't alone. Coming into the room was none other than Andrea; Amanda's older sister.

"Hey sis and girls." She said with a smile. "Sorry for the wait, I was taking a nap."

"Hello Andrea, where just on our break from cookie selling." She said "Can you give us something to eat?"

Andrea nodded and goes to the kitchen. Amanda then notices Nadia picking her ear.

"Don't mind me; my ear is bit itchy." She said.

Amanda shrugs and sees her sister coming back from the kitchen with a plate of sandwiches, chips, and drinks.

"Well that was some fast." Said Penny.

"That's because I was aware that you guys would come here pretty hungry after all that hard work." Replied Andrea "But whatever; dig in."

The girls picked up each sandwiches and all began to chow down. Nadia on the other hand was still scratching her ear while she eats, but eventually stops after a few seconds.

Meanwhile...
1412312111212321132114.title: The Hangout

choices: Blurt out your whole story
Ask her to go somewhere private so you can talk
Pretend to be someone special
Ask her about herself, rather than hog attention
Tell her not to be so scratchy with her finger
14123121112123211321142.content:
The mobile mountian continues on her way as you pull yourself upward, ever upward, as far as possible from the rumbling orifices that are her mouth and nostrils. Even the batting of her eyelids smash a draft down at you with a sound like crashing waves. This eventually convinces you to move even further to the left, the side of Nadia's head with the ear directly above.

Motion and noise is your life, your only response to move upward unerringly, without flagging or complaining. The girl seems distracted by her friends - you certainly are, as they bellow nonsense around you - and she does not attempt to crush you again before you reach her earlobe. Now, you pull yourself back into a horizontal surface, sticky wax scattered over the floor, walls and ceiling of the darkened cavern that looms ahead of you. Taking it slow, sliding through the earwax and stepping around the scattered, cacti-like stalacmite hairs, you venture forth.

She strikes! You are no more than a few steps into her canal before the light is blocked out, and a mammoth creature smashes into you. Rolling, you look back to see the unmistakable form of the girl's fingertip, scraping skin and wax from the edges of the ear as it sturggles to fit in further, to end you beneath its irresistable mass.

As it smashes up and down, shaking the world around you, you breathe relief; even the girls' smallest finger is too massive to follow you all the way down into her head. Laughing, you leave her to it and move as far through the cavern as you can, preparing your statement in your own head.

Hopefully she'll be able to hear you, above the drone of her monstrous compnions! But what approach will you take?
14123121112123211321142.title: A Voice In Her Head

141231211121232113211425.content:
While her friends are eating their sandwiches, Nadia still continues to scratch her ear. There is something inside there, she's sure of it. Unfortunately for her, the itchy feeling soon make it's way to the end of her ear; now there's no way to get rid of whatever it's itching her. For unknown reasons, the feeling stops right there and that's where she hears what sounds like someone's voice.

She couldn't make it out completely, but it looks like it briefly sounded like " Stop with the scratching! "

"Huh?" Nadia thought. Is she hearing voices in her head?

She stops scratching and listened closely.

" Thank you! " it said.

She stood there and wondered if this voice really existed or she's just going crazy. Maybe there's something crawling in her ear and looks like it's making some noises in there, maybe she'll ask Amanda about this.

She pulls her finger out of there and joins her friends in eating her snack.

What happens next?

14123122.content:
Nadia shrugged, leading the way back to the front gate. "At least it's not raining, I suppose."

Amanda smoothed down her uniform after standing, before dragging the cart along after. "We just need to think positive! We're not useless bugs, we're more like... like..."

Searching for a metaphor, the girl grinned as a garbage truck chugged along the street. "We're like that truck, slow, but if you get in our way, look out!"

"...And we stink?" Nadia laughed.

The girls stopped giggling as the passed the gate of the next house up the street. "There's a car," Amanda noted. "Maybe they're still at home?"

"If they're not, I'm going to have to find a lot more bugs to crush!" Nadia retorted, eyes scanning the garden path already.

"Oh, shush!" her friend sighed. "Now put on a smile and remember your lines!"

One finger is raised to the doorbell, and presses it inward.

Amanda tapped her foot for a few moments, before a crunch from by her friend that turned her head. But rather than crushing another bug, Nadia was munching her way through a cookie. "Hey! You can't eat those!"

"This is house five, Mandy. If no-one else is going to eat these, I may as well."

Amanda was about to reply, when the door opened wide, and she swung back around to enter into her sales-pitch. "Girl scout cookies?" she asked, as Nadia hid the open box behind her back.

The woman in the doorway was beautiful, Amanda realised as she offered forward the various varieties of cookies. "One of each," the woman replied with a grin, eagerly exchanging the snacks for a wad of cash notes. The girl scouts thanked her in chorus before moving on their way, the cart ever so slightly lighter, Nadia still chewing her way through a box.

141231221.content:
You hold on to the enormous wagon as hard as you can; you don't want to fall straight into the open road. The girls may be moving slowly but at this size, trying to catch up with them will be difficult at this size (not that you don't want to but since they're the only one you come across so far, you wouldn't have any choice so far).

You wish you could see were these young giants are going so you decided to climb above one of the giant cookie boxes, but as long as you are careful, you'll do just fine. You cling to the edge of the box and ascend your way to the top. This was alot harder than you imagine as the box was slippery but you managed to (although barely) prevent yourself from falling by holding on with your legs. Despite this, you carried on.

You finally got on top of the cookie box and quickly noticed that they already stopped at another house; ready to sell their cookies to someone inside. You hear a crunching sound nearby and see the brown-skinned one eating the cookies from one of the cookie boxes. Looking at her, you wondered if this was a good idea to stay on top of this box. Suddenly, you hear the sound of a door opening and look to see someone coming out of the house.

This person appears to be a twenty something year old woman of East Asian decent, most likely Korean as she seemed to be wearing a t-shirt resembling the flag of South Korea. Aside from the shirt, she wears a pair of blue denim shorts and white sneakers. With her long brown shoulder-length hair, pretty face and shapely figure, she looked very attractive.

The woman moved towards the cart and reached out for the cookies. At this point, her hand was beyond huge and looked more a mother ship heading towards the ground as she picked up the one you were standing on. You try to regain your balance as the box is lifted from the wagon. You look ahead to see that she is heading into her house so it's already too late to head back down.

The woman returns back inside her house and you meanwhile, try to balance yourself as hard as you can.

15.content:
Morning in the Stevenson household is like morning anywhere else. Jenna and Tim wake up earlier than they'd like; they briefly squabble over who has to go grab the paper.

Jenna loses the argument this time. Tim probably will tomorrow.

Yawning, the enormous woman slides on her robe, and heads down the stairs, while Tim goes to wake up Emily and start trying to wake up the teenagers, Brianna and Jake. She slides into her slippers and pads down the stairs, across to the door, and pausing just long enough to regard her 40-year-old self in the mirror, opens the door and bends down for the paper.

She grabs it quickly and turns, closing the door and padding back up the stairs. It's not exactly an arduous trip; she still runs fifteen miles a week, and she looks...okay, not 25, but maybe 35. She carries the paper into the room and drops it onto the bed while she waits for her husband to finish his shower. Kicking her slippers off, she folds her legs under her and peruses the headlines.

You watch a pretty but enormous woman descend the stairs, and you darn near wet yourself. She's gigantic, and she's not paying a darn bit of attention. She walks over you, causing you to drop to the floor, covering your head in a futile attempt to avoid death, but she misses. Instead, she walks to the door and opens it, and bends down, giving you, for a split second, a really great view of her behind.

She turns. You were distracted just long enough that you didn't run for the wall. Bad decision. Because this time, the slipper lands less than an inch from you at her scale -- just a few feet away.

You don't feel the impact, though; before the foot lands the air below it blows you forward and up. You tumble through the air, colliding with the fuzzy slipper, which at your scale is like colliding with a bunch of vines. You are buffeted, and finally grab onto one, which hangs precipitously over the skin of the woman.

This was just the first step she took.

You are jarred as she moves quickly up the stairs, each step shaking you with the force of an earthquake in the middle of a hurricane. Finally, at long last, she slows up, and then stops. You are already exhausted by the journey, and you don't even register the amazing view you have, directly up her nightgown. If you had, you would have noticed she wasn't wearing underwear.

"Cold!" He settles down, staring up at the ceiling. "No breakfast for the kids?"

"Cereal this morning. Need five more minutes." Jenna's already got her head buried in the pillows, trying to block out the rest of the day.

Some time passes, and Tim pushes the sheets off his body. "It's 7, hun," he said to his wife, pulling on his pants. "Once I'm done dressing, how about I wake the kids?"

With a sigh, Jenna sits up. "That'd be great. I'll meet you downstairs." Tim walks out, leaving her to her thoughts.

Another sigh, and she springs into action. Pantyhose, blouse, skirt, jacket. A simple outfit, but stylish and functional. She sees the heels Tim bought her; a thoughtful gift to be sure, but they were just a bit on the tight side. She'd hold off on those for now.

By 7:10 she was at the table. The rest of the family had already assembled: Tim, trying to read a bit of the morning news on his phone; the teens, still too tired to get into a real argument, and Emily, struggling with the carton of milk. You were trying to think of places where someone would have to notice your tiny body.

info.brief_description: An unaware shrinking interactive with a storytelling twist
info.description:
You wake up one day to find yourself less than one inch tall in the home of a family you've never seen. Been done to death? Sure it has. Here's the twist -- each chapter alternates between your perspective and theirs, as they go about their lives, unaware of the tiny visitor who's accidentally intruded on their lives. Odd-numbered chapters are your perspective, even-numbered chapters are the giants'. Have fun, and stick to the rules -- as long as you do, I'll allow anything.

Character List:

YOU - Are you.

THE STEVENSON FAMILY:

JENNA STEVENSON, 40 and TIM STEVENSON, 40: A happy couple that looks good for their age. Both work outside the home; they're the proud parents of three kids.

JAKE STEVENSON, 16: A junior in high school, Jake's a very typical teenage boy.

BRIANNA STEVENSON, 14: A high school freshman, Brianna plays soccer on her school's JV squad.

EMILY STEVENSON, 7: The baby of the family, Emily is in 1st grade.

Feel free to add more characters as you wish, as long as you stick to the rules.
